name: America Diamonds Hotel
address: Rua Tomás Ribeiro, 47, 1050-226 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Housed in a restored historical building, the America Diamonds Hotel & Sushi Bar is located in Lisbon, a 10-minute walk from Marquês de Pombal Square. Picoas Metro Station is located right opposite the hotel. Renovated in 2020, the modernly designed guest rooms of the America Diamonds Hotel & Sushi Bar offer free WiFi and flat-screen TVs. They are decorated in deep blue and burgundy, and furniture with clean lines. Some rooms include a hydro-massage bathtub. A buffet breakfast is offered daily at the restaurant of the hotel. The hotel has a brand new restaurant, Up to Sushi, which closes on Sundays. In the evening, guests may also request room service or try out the fine restaurants in the neighbourhood. The America Diamonds Hotel & Sushi Bar is less than a 10-minute walk from Eduardo VII Park and the El Corte Inglés. Lisbon’s main tourist sites are easily accessible by public transport. Guests can also explore the city by rental bike.

name: 138 Liberdade Hotel
address: Avenida da Liberdade, 138-142, 1250-147 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: With a stay at Fontecruz Lisboa, you'll be centrally located in Lisbon, within a 15-minute drive of Rossio Square and Lisbon Cathedral. Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Lisbon? This hotel has 3411 square feet (317 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Luster Hotel
address: 48 Avenida Casal Ribeiro, 1000-091 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: This charming hotel is situated in Lisboa. The establishmThe Luster Hotel is in the right place for you to get the genuine feel of the heartbeat of a city with an unstoppable dynamic. In Praça Duque de Saldanha where there are two of the largest avenues in the city, Avenida da República and Avenida Fontes de Pereira de Melo, this new Hotel is designed to allow you to easily get around the city and see all that it has to offer.Museums, parks, monuments, a landmark avenue where the major luxury brands can be found, prominent buildings that house well-known companies, you'll see and do it all when you have your own place to stay in the centre. At Luster Hotel will serve as your point of reference to discover the city, solely geared towards leisure.You'll also discover that after a long day's work or meetings, you're in just the right place to relax and in time to enjoy an energy-packed night.ent consists of 56 guest rooms.Sembo

Hyatt Regency Lisboa also includes a Fitness Centre, 2 Restaurants and 1 Rooftop Bar, 4 Meeting Rooms, an exclusive Destination SPA - Serenity - The Art of Wellbeing and breathtaking views over the Tagus River in a prime location in Lisbon.Hyatt

Rooms include a coffee machine and a private bathroom, while certain rooms have a balcony and some have city views. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Commerce Square, St. George's Castle and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 9 km from Palácio Ludovice Wine Experience Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Popular points of interest near Montebelo Vista Alegre Lisboa Chiado Hotel include Rossio, St. George's Castle and Dona Maria II National Theatre. description: Attractively situated in the centre of Lisbon, Ferraria XVI FLH Hotels Lisboa features continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 600 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 1.6 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 6.9 km from Jeronimos Monastery. Some rooms at the property have a balcony with a city view. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a terrace. At Ferraria XVI FLH Hotels Lisboa rooms have bed linen and towels. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Commerce Square, St. George's Castle and Rossio. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from Ferraria XVI FLH Hotels Lisboa.

With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from St. George's Castle. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms come with a kettle, while selected rooms come with a balcony and others also offer river views. At The Editory Riverside Hotel, an Historic Hotel each room has bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.6 km from The Editory Riverside Hotel, an Historic Hotel, while Rossio is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, while some rooms have a balcony. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.8 km from Boutique Chiado Suites, while Liberty Avenue is 2.2 km from the property.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Commerce Square. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 7 km from Eurostars Lisboa Baixa, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Dos Reis by The Beautique Hotels
address: Avenida Almirante Reis, 38, 1150-018 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Conveniently situated in Lisbon, Dos Reis by The Beautique Hotels provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. At the hotel, each room comes with a wardrobe. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guest rooms at Dos Reis by The Beautique Hotels are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. There is an on-site snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Popular points of interest near Dos Reis by The Beautique Hotels include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and St. George's Castle. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 5 km from the hotel.

name: Zurin Charm Hotel
address: 46 Rua Dom Carlos de Mascarenhas, 1070-069 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Well set in the Campolide district of Lisbon, Zurin Charm Hotel is set 3.3 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 3.7 km from Commerce Square and 4.3 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. This 3-star hotel offers a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 3.1 km from Rossio. The units in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at Zurin Charm Hotel have a TV and air conditioning, and some rooms here will provide you with a balcony. All guest rooms include a safety deposit box. The accommodation offers a continental or halal breakfast. St. George's Castle is 4.3 km from Zurin Charm Hotel, while Luz Football Stadium is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

name: Empire Lisbon Hotel
address: Avenida Almirante Reis, 130, 1170-192 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Empire Lisbon Hotel is located near Lisbon's centre and is just 10 minutes away from Alameda Metro Station. It is just a 10-minute metro ride from Marquês de Pombal Square and a 15-minute metro ride from the high-end shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom, with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Empire Lisbon Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. Each morning a continental breakfast is served at the Empire Lisbon's breakfast room. A wide range of restaurants and eateries is available within a 10-minute walk. Refreshing drinks and cocktails are available in the property's bar. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the Empire Hotel. At 1.6 km is Saldanha, a popular shopping area in central Lisbon. Rossio is 3.8 km from Empire Lisbon Hotel, while Chiado is 4.8 km from the property. Bairro Alto is at a 5 km distance and features various popular bars, restaurants and cafés. Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport is 4.4 km away.

name: O Elétrico Guesthouse
address: Rua Dos Anjos 12D, 1150-037 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a flat-screen TV, as well as a minibar and air conditioning. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, tour/ticket assistance, and multilingual staff.Expedia

name: Dinya Lisbon Hotel & Lounge Bar
address: Rua Ilha do Pico, 3, 1000-169 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Dinya Lisbon Hotel is situated in central Lisbon, just 220 metres from Saldanha Metro and 100 metres from the closest bus stop. It features a bar, 24-hour reception desk and free WiFi. All guest bedrooms at Dinya Lisbon Hotel are equipped with an en-suite bathroom. In addition, every room features cableTV and air conditioning. Continental breakfast is served each morning in the hotel’s spacious breakfast area. The Dinya Lisbon also features a TV room and a bar located in the terrace. The Dinya is situated 2.5 km from Castelo de São Jorge and 3 km from the Tagus River. Lisbon International Airport is only 5 km away. The hotel offers a car rental service on site (upon request and upon availability).

name: Mama Shelter Lisboa
address: Rua do Vale de Pereiro 19, 1250-270 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: In downtown Lisbon, The 130 room Mama Lisboa is close to Marques de Pombal metro station, Avenida da Liberdade and the botanical gardens. Its design is closely related to fishermen and the sea: lively and welcoming but also intimate, with overtones of the first Mama, Mama Shelter in Paris. The outside terrace is behind the restaurant with plants, comfortable white seating and terracotta decoration. The walls and ceiling are covered with more abstract designs by French artist Beniloys.accorhotels.com

name: Bairro Alto Hotel
address: Praca Luis De Camoes 2, 1200-243 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in Lisbon's city centre in the luxurious yet traditional Bairro Alto and Chiado districts. This Boutique Hotel is set in an historical building from the 18th century and features 87 guestrooms, including 2 signature suites, 8 Suites and 12 Junior Suites.Guestrooms offer views over the Tagus River or 2 of the most iconic districts in Lisbon: Chiado and Bairro Alto. The hotel encompasses a restaurant with an award-winning Chef and overlooks the river and Lisbon's Old Town. In addition, there are 4 meeting rooms, all with natural light and separate entrance for private meetings or events. S. Jorge Castle is 1.5 km from Bairro Alto Hotel, and Sé Catedral de Lisboa is 1 km away. Many boutique shops, galleries, picturesque streets and restaurants are within walking distance from the hotel. Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport is 7.5 km away.

name: Hotel Luena
address: Rua Pascoal De Melo, 9, 1000-230 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Set in Lisbon, Hotel Luena is at a 10-minute walk from Saldanha and is 400 metres from the Arroios Metro Station. A daily breakfast buffet is provided. The hotel's rooms come with free WiFi, air conditioning, parquet floors and a flat-screen cable TV. Featuring a bath tub, the private bathroom in each room also comes with a hairdryer. Guests can relax in the shared lounge and there is also an onsite bar. Marquês de Pombal Square and the gardens of Eduardo VII Park are at a 20-minute walk. Within a 25-minute walk are the high-end shops and boutiques at Avenida da Liberdade. Lisbon's historic downtown area is reachable through a 20-minute metro ride. Humberto Delgado International Airport is within 4.4 km from Hotel Luena.

name: My Story Hotel Augusta
address: R. de São Nicolau, 78, 1100-549 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in Lisbon, within 500 metres of Rossio and 600 metres of Dona Maria II National Theatre, My Story Hotel Augusta features accommodation with a bar. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Liberty Avenue is 1.8 km away. All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The units include a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish and French. Commerce Square is 350 meters from My Story Hotel Augusta, while Castelo de São Jorge is 850m away

name: Alegria A Lisbon Boutique Hotel
address: Praca da Alegria 12, Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: This hotel features uniquely decorated rooms on Alegria Square. Renovated in 2016, the Hotel boasts a Romantic-style décor, with authentic Portuguese antiques. It is a 3-minute walk from Avenida Metro Station and from Avenida da Liberdade's trendy shops. Alegria A Lisbon Boutique Hotel’s rooms feature large windows and soundproofing. Each air-conditioned room has all-new bedding, a TV and free WiFi. A bath or shower are featured in the private bathroom, as well as bathrobes and slippers. Suites with a seating area are also available among the accommodation options. A continental breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room and there is a bar serving selected drinks. Various restaurants and cafés are accessible at a 5-minute walk. Alegria A Lisbon Boutique Hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from the nearby bus stops, which provide easy access to the rest of the city. The boutique shops and terrace cafés of Baixa Chiado are a 7-minute walk away. Lisbon International Airport is accessible via a 25-minute metro ride.

name: Iberostar Selection Lisboa
address: Rua Castilho 64, 1250-071 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The 5-star Iberostar Selection Lisboa is located steps from the Eduardo VII Park and the Marquês de Pombal Square, in the Lisbon centre. With a bar and restaurant, the property has an outdoor swimming pool and features a terrace with gardens. With different types of rooms, guests are able to choose between rooms with views over the city or suites. Room service is available 24 hours a day, at an extra cost. A continental breakfast is served each morning at the property. The hotel offers a delicious and unique variety of gastronomic products that guests can try in the Restaurant Luz and in the Boalma Bar. Iberostar Selection Lisboa has 7 meeting rooms, some of which can be converted into 2 or 3 event areas, with a capacity for up to 250 people. Services available at an extra fee include a laundry service, 24-hour reception and private parking. At Iberostar's SPA Sensations, guests can enjoy the Heated indoor pool, sauna, sensory shower, Turkish bath and massage services at an extra cost. The gym is free. The famous Avenida da Liberdade is a 5-minute walk from Iberostar Selection Lisboa. Bairro Alto is just 1.2 km from the hotel and the iconic São Jorge Castle is 3.5 km away. Lisbon International Airport is 10 km away and is reachable via metro.

name: Wine & Books Lisboa Hotel
address: Travessa da Memoria, 56, 1300-403 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located one of the main typical neighborhoods of the city, Ajuda, Wine & Books Hotel Lisboa is located just a short walk from one of the most important monumental areas of Lisbon, Belm. This exclusive 24 rooms property offers you bespoke service with all the amenities you need to make your stay in Lisbon a memorable one.iHotelier/iStay

name: My Story Hotel Figueira
address: Praca da Figueira 15, 1100-241 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Set in Lisbon and with Rossio reachable within 200 metres, My Story Hotel Figueira offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 1.3 km from the city centre and 300 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the hotel. Popular points of interest near My Story Hotel Figueira include Commerce Square, St. George's Castle and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Le Consulat
address: Praca Luis de Camões, 22, 1249-190 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Centrally located in Lisbon, the renovated Le Consulat is set in the Luís de Camões Square and is just a few minutes’ walk from the Chiado shopping area. Free WiFi is available. Each of the Le Consulat’s rooms and suites was decorated in collaboration with the most important art galleries of Lisbon. All units are equipped with air conditioning, soundproofing and the Consulaire/Ambassadeur suites offer a fully equipped kitchenette and a dining area. A breakfast buffet is available every morning and guests may relax at the Le Consulat’s on-site bar. The surrounding area offers a variety of restaurants serving Portuguese and international cuisine, and the trendy nightlife neighbourhood of Bairro Alto is just a few metres away. Le Consulat features an exhibit area on the 2nd floor where new Portuguese artists show their latest work and there is a tea area on the 1st floor where guests may socialize. The Baixa-Chiado Metro Station is a 1-minute walk and the Cais do Sodré Train Station, connecting guests to Estoril and Cascais, is 600 metres away. Lisbon International Airport is 9 km away, easily accessible via public transportation.

name: Vip Executive Saldanha
address: Rua Fernao Lopes 25, 1000-132 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Situated in central Lisbon, the 4-star Vip Executive Saldanha offers contemporary accommodation with stylish breakfast room and bar. Picoas Subway Station is 100 metres away. Rooms at Executive Saldanha feature white linens and designer furniture. Each offers free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and soundproof windows. Guests can enjoy a cocktail in Vip Executive's modern bar area or benefit from the lively location and discover many local and world-class restaurants. The hotel's reception is open 24/7 and can arrange currency exchange and dry cleaning services. Portela Airport is less than 5 km away.

description: No description found

name: Rossio Plaza Hotel
address: Rua Aurea, 266, 1100-581 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Attractively set in the centre of Lisbon, Rossio Plaza Hotel provides 3-star accommodation close to Commerce Square and Rossio. The property is around 7 km from Jeronimos Monastery, 7.9 km from Luz Football Stadium and 8.5 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Rossio Plaza Hotel rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or gluten-free breakfast. Popular points of interest near Rossio Plaza Hotel include St. George's Castle, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

name: My Story Hotel Ouro
address: Rua Áurea 100, 1100-063 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: With a themed décor based on Portuguese tiles, the charming My Story Hotel Ouro occupies an 18th century building in the heart of the historic Baixa district of Lisbon. Its outdoor esplanade is on one of Lisbon's traditional pedestrian streets. Featuring a golden headboard, all air-conditioned rooms have a private bathroom, a Smart TV, safe and free WiFi. They also have a minibar. Communicating rooms are available upon availability. Each room has an elegant décor and some feature views over the surrounding streets. Featuring tasty dishes and a comprehensive cocktail list, the bar and restaurant at My Story Hotel Ouro is a great spot to enjoy traditional Portuguese cuisine or savour a drink. The central location of the hotel allows guests to easily explore the capital city. The reception is open 24-hours a day. Tejo River is around 400 metres and offers the ideal setting to enjoy a drink while watching the sunset, in of Commerce Square's summer terraces. Santa Justa Lift is less than 5-minutes walking from the hotel. Baixa/Chiado Metro Station is a few steps from My Story Hotel Ouro, providing access to most of the greater Lisbon area. The historic façade of the Rossio Train Station is within 5 minutes’ walking. Lisbon International Airport is 7.6 km away and is accessible via metro.

name: Lisbon City Hollywood Hotel by City Hotels
address: Rua Palmira 14, 1170-286 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in Lisbon and with Miradouro da Senhora do Monte reachable within 700 metres, Lisbon City Hollywood Hotel by City Hotels provides a garden, allergy-free rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business centre. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Rossio. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Lisbon City Hollywood Hotel by City Hotels offers a sun terrace. Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.3 km from the accommodation, while Commerce Square is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 5 km from Lisbon City Hollywood Hotel by City Hotels.

name: Santa Justa Prime Guesthouse

name: Flores Guest House
address: Rua De São Marçal Nº 30, 1200-299 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: No description found

name: Casa do Principe
address: Praça do Principe Real 23, 1st Floor, 1250-184 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Casa do Príncipe is a charming B&B nestled in the heart of Lisbon, facing the Príncipe Real Garden. The property is just a 7-minute walk from the Liberdade Avenue and its metro station. All the spacious and sunny rooms and suites have a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some units include views of the garden or city. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with shower. Each unit have intricately stuccowork ceilings, real hardwood floors and authentic frescos. Casa do Príncipe is within walking distance from a variety of signature restaurants serving various cuisines including traditional Portuguese gastronomy. The trendy Bairro Alto neighbourhood is just a 5-minute walk away and features a multitude of bars where guest can relax and enjoy a beverage. The elegant shopping area of Chiado is 1 km away while the historical neighbourhood of Alfama and the iconic São Jorge Castle are 2 km away. The nearest airport is Portela Airport, 6 km from Casa do Principe.

name: Palácio das Especiarias
address: Rua da Horta Seca 11, 1200-170 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Enjoying a privileged location in the historic center of Lisbon, the property is a former palace whose construction dates back to the 16th century. This boutique hotel combines modern comfort with a classic atmosphere. The accommodation has air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. In the range of rooms available, there are 3 exclusive royal suites and 2 superior suites with views over the Tagus River or over the old town. Every morning a continental breakfast is served with live music, piano or violin. Popular points of interest near Palácio das Especiarias are the picturesque Chiado and Bairro-Alto districts, Commerce Square, Rossio and São Jorge Castle. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from the property.

name: Altis Avenida Hotel
address: Rua 1º De Dezembro, 120, 1200-360 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The 5-star Altis Avenida Hotel offers luxury accommodation in the heart of Lisbon city. It is within a 5-minute walk from the shopping triangle, Rua Augusta Street, Chiado and Liberdade Avenue. Altis Avenida Hotel is housed in a historical building, where guests will find a mix of traditional Portuguese architecture and design inspired by Art Deco. The plush rooms feature signature retro-style furniture with the soft shades of the leather headboards. Some rooms offer views of Lisbon's historical downtown and balconies. With a singular view over Lisbon and Tagus River, the Rossio Gastrobar offers a surprising menu of shareable dishes, a signature menu of cocktails and a careful selection of wines. A tasty breakfast buffet may be enjoyed on the 7th floor with a panoramic view over Liberdade Avenue. With a 24-hour front desk, the hotel features a business centre and meeting rooms. Laundry, dry cleaning, ironing and shoeshine services are provided, upon an extra fee. A car rental service is also available. The Altis Avenida Hotel is steps from Rossio Station and close to Santa Justa Elevator. Historic Chiado features many traditional shops and cafés, at a 10-minute walk. Also within a 10-minute walk are the bars of the popular Bairro Alto district. Portela International Airport is 7 km from Hotel Altis Avenida.

name: Hf Fenix Garden
address: Rua Joaquim Antonio de Aguiar, 3, 1050-010 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The stylish Hotel Fenix Garden is situated on the Marquês de Pombal Square in the centre of Lisbon. Eduardo VII Park and Marques Pombal Metro Station are just steps away, while the high-end shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade are at a short walk. The HF Fénix Garden offers bright accommodation with wooden floors. Each air-conditioned room offers free WiFi, a work desk, cable TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The café serves a variety of snacks and drinks. Guests can enjoy a freshly-made breakfast each morning and drink coffee brews from a Nespresso machine. With a subway station right around the corner, there is easy access to all the city's sights. Plenty of cultural attractions and shopping venues are found nearby. Rossio is at a 7-minute metro ride, while Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport is 13.2 km away.

name: Hotel Principe Lisboa
address: Avenida Duque De Avila, 201, Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Hotel Príncipe Lisboa provides contemporary rooms with LED TV's and minibar, just 500 metres from the Museu Calouste Gulbenkian. It is conveniently situated in front of São Sebastião Metro Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Our Continental Buffet Breakfast is served daily from 7:30 am to 10h30 am. The modern rooms of the Hotel Príncipe feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and light oak furniture. The private bathrooms come with complimentary bathroom amenities. Set in an area with many cafes and restaurants nearby, Príncipe Lisboa is situated 15 minutes by metro from the city centre. Guests can also walk to the centre through the picturesque Park Edward VII. Lisbon Portela Airport is 25 minutes away by public transport and around 15 minutes by car. The hotel also provides laundry services and car rental facilities.

name: Hotel Star Inn Lisbon Aeroporto
address: Aeroporto Internacional Lisboa, Rua C-2, 1749-125 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located 100 meters from Lisbon Airport Humberto Delgado, Star inn Lisbon Airport features a restaurant, bar and free WiFi throughout the property. Private indoor and outdoor parking is available on site, along with a charging station for electrical vehicles. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy snacks during the day at the Stars Caffé from 11h00 until 02h00, as well as continental breakfast buffet from 02h00 until 05h00 and full breakfast buffett from 05h00 until 11h00. Nations Park is 2.8 km from Star inn Lisbon Airport, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 2.9 km away. Guests have easy access to all Lisbon through the Airport Metro Station, located a 5-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, a few steps from Star inn Lisbon Airport. Please note that the baby cot/crib can only be provided after a confirmation from the hotel. Any supplements such as extra beds are not included in the room rate automatically. Therefore, it will be paid directly to the property separately from the reservation price. Please note that reservations of 9 rooms or more are subject to different policies and extra charges. The name on the credit card used for the booking should correspond to the guest staying at the property. For reservations made with a third party credit card, any previous charges will be reimbursed and the full payment will be requested upon check-in. Please note that a maximum of 2 pets up to 20kg per accommodation are allowed, at a cost of 20€ per pet, per night. Pets are permitted at the restaurant and bar. When travelling with pets, please note that a refundable damage deposit of 100€ per stay, applies.

name: Urbano Flh Hotels Lisboa
address: 42 Rua da Madalena, 1100-321 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Conveniently located in Lisbon, Urbano FLH Hotels Lisboa offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 1.6 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 7.3 km from Jeronimos Monastery and 7.8 km from Luz Football Stadium. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from St. George's Castle. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Urbano FLH Hotels Lisboa all rooms have bed linen and towels. Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak English, Spanish, French and Portuguese. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Commerce Square, Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 7 km from Urbano FLH Hotels Lisboa, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Olissippo Marques de Sa
address: Avenida Miguel Bombarda, 130, Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in Lisbon, just a short walk from Saldanha Metro Station, Hotel Olissippo Marques de Sa provides 4-star accommodation and complimentary wireless internet. It is conveniently positioned for those wishing to discover the area's attractions. This trendy hotel offers 24-hour room service, a coffee bar and valet parking. For fashionable travellers a bar provides a hip setting for an evening drink. Hotel Olissippo Marques De Sa Lisbon has air conditioned rooms with a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. They are all soundproofed and include an in-room closet, an in-room safe and a desk. Those staying at Hotel Olissippo Marques de Sa can unwind with a beverage at the on-site bar, or have a meal at Varanda do Marquês Restaurant. There is a range of breakfast options on offer every morning. Hotel Olissippo Marques De Sa Lisbon is within walking distance of New University of Lisbon, Eduardo VII Park and Campo Pequeno Bullring. It is within walking distance of Marques of Pombal Metro Station, which allows for easy access in and around Lisbon.Revato

name: Angels Inn Guesthouse
address: Av. Almirante Reis 85, 1, 1150-012 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a flat-screen TV, as well as air conditioning and daily housekeeping. Other amenities include towels, luggage storage, access to a safety deposit box, and a laptop-friendly workspace.Expedia

name: The Felix 10
address: 10 Rua de Sao Felix, 1200-840 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Set in Lisbon, 3.8 km from Commerce Square and 4.2 km from Rossio, The Felix 10 offers accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a terrace and a bar. The bed and breakfast offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and walk-in shower. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and gluten-free options. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Dona Maria II National Theatre is 4.3 km from The Felix 10, while St. George's Castle is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: WC by The Beautique Hotels
address: Avenida Almirante Reis 35, 1150-018 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in Lisbon's famed Almirante Reis Street, 900 metres from the historic downtown, WC by The Beautique Hotels is a uniquely decorated hotel. The property's décor was carefully designed to express the cleanliness and comfort of a modern bathroom. All of the comfortable and soundproofed rooms are elegantly furnished and come equipped with a Smart TV. Each also includes a coffee machine, with complimentary capsules. The rooms also features a private bathroom, with free toiletries. WC by The Beautique Hotels has free WiFi throughout the property. A breakfast buffet is served each morning at the restaurant area. The surrounding area features a wide range of restaurants, many within a 5 to 10-minute walk. Intendente Metro Station is at the doorstep. Historic Rossio is 1.4 km from WC by The Beautique Hotels, while Chiado is 1 km away. Bairro Alto is at 2 km and the property is 1.3 km from Liberty Avenue’s high-end shops and boutiques. Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport is 6.5 km from the property.

name: Alfama - Lisbon Lounge Suites
address: Escolas Gerais 38, 1100-213 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Alfama - Lisbon Lounge Suites offers modern and elegant apartments and rooms in Lisbon’s Alfama district. Located less than 10 minutes walking distance from São Jorge Castle, some have Tagus River views. All apartments and rooms at Lisbon Lounge are modern and spacious. The apartments include a fully equipped kitchen and a living room with sofa bed. Rooms and apartments include free WiFi and each has its own private bathroom. Guests staying in the apartments can prepare their own meals in the fully equipped kitchen. The surrounding area is filled with restaurants and bars, within 500 metres. Guests can relax in the living area of the lobby, equipped with plush sofas, and there is luggage storage available for extra comfort. The front desk can arrange a shuttle service to Lisbon Airport, located 7 km away. Traditional Lisbon trams run right in front of Lounge Suites and can take guests to Chiado district. Portas do Sol viewpoint is a 5-minute walk away.

name: My Story Hotel Rossio
address: Praca Dom Pedro IV (Rossio Square), 59, 1100-200 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Offering a restaurant, My Story Hotel Rossio is located in Lisbon. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy city view from the room. Extras include a desk, a safety deposit box and bed linen. At My Story Hotel Rossio you will find a 24-hour front desk and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage. The hotel is in Rossio, 400 metres from Chiado and 350 metres from Liberty Avenue. Lisbon Portela Airport is 6 km away. You can enjoy city view from some of the rooms.

name: Olissippo Saldanha
address: Av. Praia da Vitoria, 30, 0 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located less than 60 metres from Duque de Saldanha Square, the 4-star Olissippo Saldanha offers a 24-hour reception and bright, modern rooms. Saldanha Metro Station is a 4-minute walk. Rooms at Olissippo are air-conditioned and include a flat-screen cable TV. All rooms have elevator access and feature a private bathroom, and some have a seating area with a plush sofa. A breakfast buffet is served daily, including hot and cold items, and can also be served in the guests’ rooms. A bar is available for guests wishing to relax with a drink and a chat. The restaurants next door serve international cuisine. To explore further Lisbon and its surroundings there is a car rental service available, as well as currency exchange services. The business centre and meeting facilities on site cover guests’ business needs. Lisbon International Airport is 5.5 km from Olissippo Saldanha and is easily reached by public transports. The lively Bairro Alto district is 3.5 km, and the business and shopping district of Parque das Nações is 8 km away.

name: Lr Guest House
address: Rua do Norte 83-1º, 1200-284 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: No description found

name: Neya Lisboa Hotel
address: Rua Dona Estefânia, 71-77, 1150-132 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Neya Lisboa Hotel is located in a quiet area in the city centre. The hotel is about 5 km away from the airport with various options of transportation. The hotel provides room services along with buffet breakfast. Free WiFi is available. Air-conditioned rooms are fitted with shiatsu massage pillows and a spacious and fully equipped private bathroom. The Lounge BAR, serves drinks and snacks menus. Neya Lisboa Hotel offers bicycles to guests for sustainable trips around the city. Guest can also enjoy day spa with a hot tub, massage services and natural beauty treatments. Neya Lisboa Hotel is situated about 15-minute walk away from Marquês de Pombal Square and the beginning of Avenida da Liberdade.

name: Lisbon Style Guesthouse
address: Avenida Almirante Reis, 55, 1150-011 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: No description found

name: Lisbon Marriott Hotel
address: Avenida dos Combatentes 45, 1600-042 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Portugal's spectacular capital city beckons at Lisbon Marriott Hotel, an urban resort within the city. Arrive with ease; our hotel is a short distance away from Lisbon Airport while still providing seamless access to the city center. Once you've checked in, relish in a unique experience in our hotel rooms and suites, all of which feature floor-to-ceiling windows, high-speed Wi-Fi and private balconies. Awaken refreshed and stop by our on-site dining destination, Citrus Restaurant Grill, for a delicious and authentic Portuguese meal. Historic attractions, football stadiums, notable businesses and cultural must-sees are all outside of doors; after a busy day of sightseeing, relax by the pool and garden or enjoy tapas and wine on our sunny outdoor terrace. For those seeking meeting or event space in Lisbon, our hotel also offers a wide array of venue options, plus dynamic catering services. Come discover Portugal from the inviting comfort of Lisbon Marriott Hotel — we look forward to your visit.Marriott

name: Santiago de Alfama - Boutique Hotel
address: Rua de Santiago, 10 a 14, 1100-494 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The 5-star Santiago de Alfama – Boutique Hotel is located in the historic centre of Lisbon just an 8-minute walk from the iconic São Jorge Castle and offers panoramic views of the city. With free WiFi, this charming hotel is just 500 metres from the Pombaline Downtown. Set on an historic building, each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with bath or shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The on-site á lá carte restaurant offers a varied menu and the bar is the perfect place to relax in the evening after a day spent exploring Lisbon. A continental breakfast can be served in the room. The 24-hour front desk of the Santiago de Alfama – Boutique Hotel provides a tour desk and a concierge service. Babysitting, ironing and laundry services are available upon request. The lively Bairro Alto district and the shopping area of Chiado are within a 20-minute walk and the nearest metro station is Terreiro do Paço, 800 metres away. Lisbon International Airport is 7 km away.

name: Meraprime Gold Design Hotel
address: Rua Áurea, 52, 1100-063 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: MeraPrime Gold is a design hotel set in Lisbon's historic downtown, at just a 3-minute walk from Commerce Square, which overlooks the Tagus River. Featuring a restaurant, which is also a boutique café, the property is 200 metres from the Baixa/Chiado Metro Station. All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, wardrobe as well as free WiFi, which is available throughout the property. With a private bathroom, some rooms at MeraPrime Gold also have a river view. All of the food served at the property has a Halal Certification. A continental or à la carte breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The hotel's Allow - License to Snack café features sweets, savoury snacks and assorted delicacies, all within a a cosy atmosphere. The surrounding area features a multitude of cafés and eateries, where guests can taste traditional Portuguese meals and delicacies, like the well-known Pastel de Nata. Cais do Sodré, a lively nightlife area, is at a 600-metre distance. The famed Bairro Alto is an 8-minute walk, while Chiado is a 10-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 9.8 km from MeraPrime Gold.

name: Maxime Hotel
address: Praça da Alegria, 58, 1250-004 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Formerly known as a cabaret, the Maxime is now reborn as a hotel. The place where spies and dancers from last century dwelt, is now open to guests and Lisbon’s visitors retaining all its former glory. Always in good care by the mysterious Lady Maxime, guests will enjoy carefully decorated rooms with a variety of themes ranging from the dressing room, the stage or the bondage. Each is air conditioned and comes with a Nespresso machine, a private bathroom with Castelbel amenities, a Marshall speaker and a flat-screen TV. The bar kept its original counter and hosts a restaurant as well. Guests can enjoy a thematic menu next to the glorious stage, under the original ceiling of the cabaret and surrounded by replicas of the original chandeliers. Every Friday and Saturday guests can enjoy the Maxime Restaurant & Bar cabaret shows. Hotel Maxime is just 1-minute walk from the Liberdade Avenue and metro station. Rossio Square is 700 metres away and the Chiado shopping area is a 10-minute walk away. Lisbon Airport is 7 km away.

name: Turim Saldanha Hotel
address: Rua Pedro Nunes, 16, 1050-132 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in central Lisbon, TURIM Saldanha Hotel features a restaurant and bar. The property is situated 400 metres from Eduardo VII Park and from Saldanha, with 2 metro stations at a 5-minute walk. The comfortable rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom, with a bath or shower, as well as free toiletries and a hair dryer. Guests are welcome to enjoy tasty Portuguese-style meals at the hotel’s restaurant. Alternatively, guests may enjoy the Japanese cuisine of the on-site Tsubaki Restaurante. The city’s posh Liberty Avenue is 1.2 km away, featuring many high-end shops and boutiques. TURIM Saldanha Hotel is a 15-minute Metro ride from both Chiado and Rossio. The iconic São Jorge Castle is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Portela Airport, 7.2 km from the property.

name: Vincci Liberdade
address: Rua Rosa Araújo, 16, 1250-195 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Primely set next to Lisbon’s poshest street, Avenida da Liberdade, this 4-star hotel is located in the city centre. Sited in a renovated historical building, Vincci Liberdade includes a restaurant, bar and private parking. The hotel’s elegant and modern rooms all come with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The air-conditioned units also feature a private bathroom and most also have a small seating area. Breakfast service is available and is served each morning at the hotel’s restaurant. Guests wishing to enjoy lunch or dinner at the hotel’s restaurant will be able to choose from a menu that includes various Portuguese specialities, as well as some international dishes. The 24-hour front desk staff is always available to assist guests. Staff will be more than happy to help guests with suggestions of the best nearby spots and eateries. At the end of a day touring Lisbon, guests can relax in the lounge area with a drink or cocktail from the hotel’s bar. The Vincci is just steps from trendy Avenida da Liberdade, famed for being the site for numerous high-end shops and boutiques. Avenida Metro Station is just a 5-minute walk and features connections with most of the city’s emblematic areas. Rossio is a 9-minute metro ride, while Chiado and Bairro Alto are a 12-minute metro ride away. Lisbon’s Portela International Airport is 8 km from Vincci Liberdade and is also accessible via metro.

name: Hf Fénix Urban
address: Av. António Augusto De Aguiar, 14, 1050-016 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Centrally located in Lisbon, the non-smoking HF Fénix Urban is a modern 4-star hotel offering free Wi-Fi and contemporary guestrooms with flat screen TVs. HF Fénix Urban’s Parque Restaurant serves a wide range of international cuisine and regional dishes. There is also a hotel bar, where guests can enjoy the relaxed atmosphere while having a drink. The bright, airy rooms have a minibar stocked with drink and refreshments. HF Fénix Urban offers breakfast in the room for those who wish to stay in the comfort of their room. Lisbon’s famous Parque Eduardo VII is just a few minutes’ walk from HF Fénix Urban. The city's historical centre and Avenida de Liberdade is a short drive away.

name: Pensao Praca Da Figueira
address: Travessa Nova de S. Domingos 9, 1100-372 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Housed in a listed baroque building with Rossio Metro Station on its doorstep, this entirely non-smoking guesthouse offers great value-accommodation in Lisbon's historic Baixa Pombalina. It features free WiFi access. Some rooms are air conditioned and provide en suite bathrooms with hairdryer; others offer views of Praça Da Figueira Square. Pensão Praça Da Figueira also offers 24-hour reception services to its guests. There is a laundry and ironing service available, as well as bicycle rental and luggage storage. Situated among traditional restaurants and Fado houses, Pensão Praça Da Figueira is 2 metro stops away from Cais Do Sodré Train Station, linking directly to the seaside resort town of Cascais.

name: Tesouro da Baixa by Shiadu
address: Rua Dom Duarte, 3, 1100-198 Lisbon, Lisbon District
