name: The Emerald House Lisbon, Curio Collection by Hilton
address: Rua Das Janelas Verdes, 130, 1200-690 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The National Museum of Ancient Art is just a minute away, plus our hotel hosts an array of historical artwork. Several transit stops and Doca Alcantara are less than two kilometers away. Within a 10-minute walk you’ll find dozens of cafes, bars, and beautiful architecture. We also feature an on-site bar and restaurant, plus 1,300 sq. ft. of event space.Hilton

name: Boemio Flh Hotels
address: Largo São Domingos 22, 1100-076 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: No description found

name: Olissippo Oriente
address: Avenida Dom Joao Ii, Lote 1.03.2.2a, 1900-083 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Olissippo Oriente is located in Lisbon’s Parque das Nações, just 300 metres from the Vasco da Gama Shopping Centre and at a 4-minute walk from the Oriente Station transport hub, which has connectios with the city's historic centre. Lisbon's popular Oceanarium is within 500 metres. The rooms of Olissippo feature a modern interior decorated with wooden furniture. All rooms have a flat-screen satellite TV, soundproofing, a minibar, and a work desk. There's also the option of a spacious junior suite, complete with a comfortable seating area. Room service is available, at an extra fee. The Olissippo Oriente’s Descobertas restaurant serves a combination of traditional Portuguese dishes and international cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a variety of snacks and light meals on the shaded terrace at Coffee Shop Oriente. The reception of Olissippo Oriente is open 24/7. The hotel also offers car rental, fax and photocopying services, and laundry facilities. The Lisbon Casino is a mere 3-minute walk from the hotel. Altice Arena, site of various concerts and entertainment events is at 500 metres. Feira Internacional de Lisboa is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Lisbon International Airport is just 3 km away and is reachable via metro.

name: Inn Bairro Alto - Ba Sweet
address: Travessa Das Mercês, 52-50, Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in the Lisbon centre, Inn Bairro Alto BA Sweet offers private and shared accommodations in Bairro Alto, 300 metres from Baixa/Chiado Metro Station. It offers free WiFi access. Inn Bairro Alto BA Sweet features studios, double rooms, twin rooms, superior rooms and premium rooms. Guests can enjoy a common living and dining room with other guests. The restaurants nearby feature Portuguese cuisine, as well as Fado music. São Jorge Castle, offering the best panoramic views of Lisbon, is a 25-minute walk away, and Chiado shopping area is around 500 metres away. Staff at the reception can organise guided tours. Lisbon International Airport is located a 20-minute drive from Inn Bairro Alto BA Sweet.

name: Sofitel Lisbon Liberdade
address: Avenida da Liberdade, 127, 1269-038 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The Sofitel Lisbon Liberdade elegant 5-star hotel has comfort, luxury and style. On prestigious Avenida da Liberdade, its 163 rooms, with Sofitel MyBed, including 12 suites, will meet your expectations. Close to the historic districts and the congress center, the hotel integrates business and leisure. Enjoy your preferred flavors and new discoveries at the Matiz Lisboa restaurant and bar.accorhotels.com

name: República Bed & Breakfast
address: Avenida da República, 83-4th, 1050-243 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Attractively set in Lisbon, República Bed & Breakfast features a continental breakfast and free WiFithroughout the property. The property is situated 3.7 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 3.9 km from Rossio and 4 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The guest house has family rooms. At the guest house, every room includes a desk. Rooms come with a safety deposit box, while certain rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also boast garden views. At República Bed & Breakfast all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Luz Football Stadium is 4.3 km from the accommodation, while Commerce Square is 4.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 6 km from República Bed & Breakfast.

name: Moxy Lisboa Oriente
address: Avenida Aquilino Ribeiro Machado, 10, Lisboa - Parque Das Nacoes, 1800-399 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Lisbon is a city buzzing with energy, with a reputation for art, multiculturalism, gastronomy, and host of major international events. Moxy Lisboa Oriente, located in the heart of Parque das Nações; Lisbon´s creative hub where the future is happening. The stylish hotel, with an unbeatable location close to Lisbon´s most vibrant transportation hub and a few minutes away from Lisbon´s airport. With 222 cozy rooms with modern TVs, lightning fast free Wi-Fi, world renown Marriott plush queen beds, bathrooms with fancy product dispensers, energy filled communal space, food, snacks and drinks available 24/7 and gym, Moxy Lisboa Oriente´ s presents an affordable experience. At our lobby, bustling with music, you can chill out with friends, have a drink, or grab yummy snacks any time of the day or night, because our bar and our crew is always awaiting you. Portugal´s eclectic capital city is on every traveler’s bucket list and Moxy is the starting point. RNET: 9335Marriott

name: Esqina Urban Lodge
address: Rua dos Sapateiros 92, 1100-054 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Set in Lisbon's historic centre, Esqina Urban Lodge is a short 3-minute walk from Chiado and a 2-minute walk from Rossio Square. The Tagus riverside area and Commerce Square are at a 6-minute walk, while Baixa/Chiado Metro Station is within 80 metres. The property features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. and include a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and a hairdryer. The surrounding area offers a wide range of restaurants, cafés and shops, many within a short walk from the accommodation. At a 10-minute walk is Bairro Alto, while Avenida da Liberdade is within a 15-minute walk. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from Esqina Urban Lodge. The airport is accessible via metro.

name: 9Hotel Mercy
address: Rua da Misericordia, 76, 1200-273 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Modern, 4-star 9Hotel Mercy features spacious rooms overlooking old Lisbon and São Jorge castle. The larger rooms offer panoramic views over Bairro Alto, Tagus Bridge or São Jorge Castle. The air-conditioned rooms were designed by Portuguese architect Miguel Saraiva. Every room has free WiFi and a minibar. The décor is modern, with contrasting colours. A daily breakfast is served at the Lounge Bar. 9Hotel Mercy's terrace bar "In Heaven" is located on the 6th floor and offers panoramic views over São Jorge Castle and the Tagus River. Room service is available via the 24-hour front desk. There are also several bars and restaurants within 200 metres. Lisbon’s Trindade Theatre is 50 metres from the 9Hotel Mercy. Rossio Train Station and Baixa/Chiado Metro Station are within 8 minutes’ walk. Lisbon International Airport is 9 km away.

name: Luzeiros Suites
address: Avenida da Republica, 77, 1050-243 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Ideally located in Lisbon, Luzeiros Suites offers a buffet breakfast and free WiFithroughout the property. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The guest house has family rooms. The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms include a kettle, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and others also have city views. At Luzeiros Suites each room comes with bed linen and towels. Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.6 km from the accommodation, while Rossio is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 6 km from Luzeiros Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Lisbon Sao Bento Hotel
address: Rua de São Bento, 347, 1269-084 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Lisbon Sao Bento Hotel is situated in central Lisbon, just 800 metres from Amoreiras Shopping and a 14-minute walk from the high-end shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade. The hotel is within a mere 170 metres from the Rato Metro Station. Featuring double rooms, twin rooms and junior suites, the Sao Bento Hotel has accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi access. Every room or suite is fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, with some featuring views of the river or city. Guests will find a private bathroom in their accommodation, which includes free toiletries and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the comfortable breakfast room. A gluten-free breakfast option is also available, upon previous request. Guests will be able to find a variety of restaurant and café options in the vicinity. Several restaurants are available within a 5-minute walk and Avenida da Liberdade has assorted eateries, where guests can discover the famed Portuguese cuisine. Those wishing to stay in, or just relaxing after a day of getting to know the city, can enjoy a refreshing drink or cocktail at the hotel's on site bar. There is also a 24-hour front desk at the property, for guests' convenience. At 1.8 km is the historic Rossio Square, reachable via metro ride and just a short walk away from the Tagus River. Bairro Alto is 1.4 km from Lisbon Sao Bento Hotel and is renowned for its lively atmosphere and multiple bars. Chiado is at 2 km from the property. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport is 8.1 km away and can also be reached via metro.

name: Hotel Marques De Pombal
address: Avenida Liberdade 243, Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Featuring individually decorated rooms with floor-to-ceiling paintings and free internet, this 4-star hotel is located on the Avenida da Liberdade. Marques de Pombal Metro Station is 20 metres away. Lisbon-themed black-and-white pictures decorate the rooms of Marques De Pombal Hotel. Flat-screen TVs and iPod docks can be found in each room, and some rooms offer a view over the boulevard. Restaurant Blu serves a range of international dishes, and guests can enjoy an after-dinner drink at the adjacent bar. An extensive breakfast, including rolls, fresh fruits and hot dishes, is served daily. A well-equipped gym with professional trainers is featured at Hotel Marques De Pombal. Guests can relax in the Finnish sauna and in the hammam, or request treatments at the beauty salon. Historic Rossio is at 1.3 km, while the scenic São Pedro de Alcântara Belvedere is at 1.1 km. Chiado is within 1.7 km. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport is 8 km away and is reachable via metro.

name: Hotel das Amoreiras - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
address: Praça Das Amoreiras nº34, 1250-020 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Hotel das Amoreiras - Small Luxury Hotels of the World is conveniently situated in Lisbon, and features a garden, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Commerce Square is 3.2 km away and St. George's Castle is 3.7 km from the hotel. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room is fitted with a coffee machine, while certain rooms include a balcony and others also offer garden views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Rossio is 2.6 km from Hotel das Amoreiras - Small Luxury Hotels of the World, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Santa Luzia B&b - Horigem
address: Rua de São Tomé 23, 1100-561 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: No description found

name: Vip Executive Picoas Hotel
address: Rua Filipe Folque, 12, 1069-191 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Featuring a bar, VIP Executive Picoas Hotel is located in the centre of Lisbon, 2.7 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The accommodation provides a business centre and a concierge service for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At VIP Executive Picoas Hotel each room includes bed linen and towels. Rossio is 2.8 km from the accommodation, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 6 km from VIP Executive Picoas Hotel.

name: Vignette Collection Convent Square Lisbon
address: Rua Dom Antão de Almada, 4, 1100-373 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Designed for discerning guests, Convent Square Lisbon Hotel is inspired by its unique location, rich history and architecture. Our contemporary hotel is built within a 13th-century Dominican Convent, whose walls tell fascinating stories of great kings, conspiracies, and the religious order that lived here to welcome travelers from near and far. Convent Square Lisbon offers a restorative hotel base to explore the city including all-day authentic Portuguese dining at Capítulo Restaurant, a vibrant fire pit, live music and an indoor plunge pool, sauna, and fitness room at our wellness center with stunning church top views. Relax in the sheltered tranquillity of the emblematic Cloister, unwind in the sauna, soak in the heated plunge pool, or head out to explore the colorful cobblestone streets of Lisbon’s Baixa neighborhood. Within walking distance of Avenida da Liberdade, Chiado, Bairro Alto and Principe Real, Rossio Square and Terreiro do Paço Square.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Solar dos Poetas
address: Praça Luís de Camões 36, 3 Piso, 1200-243 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: No description found

name: Meliá Lisboa Aeroporto
address: Rua C, Aeropuerto Internacional De Lisboa, Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located 100 metres from Lisbon International Airport, the new Meliá Lisboa Aeroporto Hotel offers a lounge bar and a restaurant on site Each room is air-conditioned and includes a sober décor with bold accents. All rooms come with a mini-bar, a cable flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests can wake up to a wholesome breakfast buffet each morning. At Restaurante Colinas de Lisboa, lunch and dinner are served à la carte and include regional and international cuisine. For a pre-dinner drink head to the lounge bar located on the reception floor. At the hotel guests will find the El Spa, a space where guests can break from routine and recharge their batteries in the swimming pools, the hot tub, hydromassage facilities, waterfalls, sauna and Turkish bath. At the gym guests have a full specialist support. The hotel features indoor and outdoor parking, with paid electrical vehicle charging stations. Parque das Nações business district is down the avenue, less than 3 km away from Meliá Lisboa Aeroporto Hotel. The Aeroporto Metro Station is within a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Lagoas Park Hotel
address: 1, Encosta Das Lagoas, 2740-245 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located 5 km from Oeiras Marina, this ultra-modern hotel offers a restaurant serving international cuisine. It provides a shuttle service to shops and local offices and has free parking. The guest rooms at the Lagoas Park Hotel have modern furnishings and are decorated in warm colours. They include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a work desk and a marble bathroom with signature amenities. Adult guests can take advantage of a modern gym inside the hotel, open 24/7. The Lagoas Park Hotel Restaurant prides itself in its cozy surroundings and serves a diverse range of cuisines and fine wines. The bar serves refreshing drinks and exotic cocktails along with snacks and light fare.

name: Jupiter Lisboa Hotel
address: Avenida da Republica, 46, 1050-195 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located halfway between Saldanha and Campo Pequeno, Jupiter Lisboa is a newly built hotel featuring a panoramic rooftop with 2 outdoor swimming pools as well as a SPA, a Portuguese restaurant and a lobby bar with food and drinks. Preserving its original 1906 architecture, Jupiter Lisboa Hotel’s spacious rooms are decorated with images of Lisbon and are equipped with free WiFi, air conditioning, soundproofing, a flat-screen TV and a work desk. Each private bathroom comes with a walk-in shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. The on-site restaurant serves a hot breakfast buffet every morning and includes a varied menu with international and traditional Portuguese dishes. The Lisboa Amada lobby bar has a variety of drinks and snacks. A 24-hour room service is available for guests’ convenience. In the summer time there's also a rooftop bar, available for snacks and drinks. Jupiter Lisboa Hotel’s 24-hour front desk can provide a variety of services including a shuttle service, bicycle and car rental, ticket service, luggage storage and a concierge service. Private underground parking is available, at an extra fee. The hotel has 3 fully equipped meeting rooms. There is a 24-hour fitness centre available, free of charge. The BluSpa at Jupiter Lisboa Hotel, features an indoor treatments pool, sauna, steam bath and a complete massages and treatments menu. These services are not included in the rate. The Baixa Pombalina and Chiado shopping areas are just a 15-minute metro trip away and both Luz and Alvalade Football Stadiums are within 4 km. Lisbon International Airport is 4 km away.

name: Hotel Travel Park Lisboa
address: Av. Almirante Reis, 64, Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: This hotel in the East of Lisbon is just 100 metres from Anjos Metro Station and 15 minutes’ walk from the bustling Praça Dom Pedro IV. It has a bar with terrace. The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Travel Park Lisboa have wooden furnishings. They include a seating area with satellite TV and a private bathroom with signature amenities. Guests of the Hotel Park can enjoy a rich buffet breakfast. The hotel serves snacks and light meals in the bar and offers room service. On warm days, meals can be enjoyed on the spacious terrace. A 24-hour front desk and car rental services are among the useful facilities offered at Hotel Travel Park Lisboa.

name: Epic Sana Lisboa Hotel
address: Av. Engenheiro Duarte Pacheco 15, 1070-100 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: With a privileged and strategic location, EPIC SANA Lisboa is the ideal hotel for any visit to the capital, both for leisure or business. Add to that an infinity pool on the rooftop and you're sure to have an experience you will want to repeat, over and over again. The comfort of the rooms and the personalized service, right down to the smallest detail, elevate the EPIC SANA Lisboa to much more than a hotel. The hotel has 2 bars: the Scale Lobby Bar and, at the top, the Up Scale Bar with an infinity pool. And for your meetings and events, the EPIC SANA Lisboa dedicates 1,760 m2 divided by 14 meeting rooms, which allow for events up to 1,300 people.iHotelier/iStay

name: Eurostars Das Letras
address: Rua Castilho 6-12, 1250-069 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Situated in historic Lisbon, Eurostars Das Letras offers designer rooms with flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi access. The Botanic Gardens of Lisbon are 1 km away. Ample and offering marble and timber furnishings, each themed room has a pillow menu and luxury bathroom amenities. Although Eurostars Das Letras is centrally located, rooms are quiet and some offer panoramic views of São Jorge castle. Guests can also enjoy outdoor dining on its spacious terrace. Facilities at Das Letras Eurostars include a well-equipped fitness centre and a sauna. The boutique hotel is less than 500 metres away from the statues of Avenida da Liberdade and less than a 5-minute walk to the Avenida Metro Station.

name: Vincci Baixa
address: Rua Do Comercio 32-38, 1100-150 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in Baixa’s centre, this 4-star hotel is 150 metres from Praça do Comércio’s bus, tram and metro links. It has an elegant restaurant and a bar. The hotel's comfortable bedrooms were fully renovated in April of 2017. The stylish rooms at the Vincci Baixa include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. They also have a minibar, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with amenities. Free WiFi is available. The Comércio 36 Restaurant serves a rich breakfast prepared with seasonal ingredients, including meals for celiacs. The lounge bar serves refreshing drinks and light snacks. Room service is also available. Convenient facilities at the Vincci include laundry services and a tour desk where guests can arrange to visit local attractions. The Baixa is surrounded by trendy bars, shops and restaurants. It is just a 5-minute walk from the historic Sé Catedral. Portela Airport is 7 km away.

name: Aurea Museum by Eurostars Hotel Company
address: Rua Cais de Santarém 52, Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Áurea Museum by Eurostars Hotel Company is a unique 5-star property situated on the banks of the Tagus River, in a historic building in Lisbon's iconic Alfama quarter. The hotel features a permanent archaeological exhibition, as well as modern facilities, like an indoor pool, restaurant, massage room and Turkish bath. The décor features references to the cultural legacy of the hotel's building. The air-conditioned rooms all come with a private bathroom, flat-screen TV, safety deposit box and a work desk. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. A daily breakfast buffet is available at the property. The in house restaurant features a variety of traditional Portuguese and International dishes. Guests can also find a wide range of restaurants and eateries within a short 5-minute walk. Alfama is famed for its Fado Houses, which pair traditional Fado concerts with tasty Portuguese tapas. A fitness centre is also featured at the property, along with a 24-hour front desk and various meeting rooms. The iconic São Jorge Castle is a 15-minute uphill walk. Commerce Square is just 500 metres away, while Rossio is a 16-minute walk from Áurea Museum by Eurostars Hotel Company. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado Airport is 8.4 km from the property.

name: Exe Saldanha
address: Avenida Defensores de Chaves 5-9, 1000-109 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Attractively set in Lisbon, Exe Saldanha features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, private parking and room service. This 3-star hotel offers a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms have a safety deposit box. Exe Saldanha offers a continental or gluten-free breakfast. Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 2.6 km from the accommodation, while Rossio is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 6 km from Exe Saldanha.

name: Next Level Premium Hotels
address: Rua do Conde de Redondo 16, 1150-186 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Set in Lisbon, 1.7 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, Next Level Premium Hotels offers accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.9 km from Rossio and around 1.8 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room comes with a kettle, while selected rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views. At Next Level Premium Hotels all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Commerce Square is 3.2 km from Next Level Premium Hotels, while St. George's Castle is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: Sana Metropolitan Hotel
address: Rua Soeiro Pereira Gomes, Parcela 2, 1600-198 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Strategically located near the Praa de Espanha and Sete Rios, the SANA Metropolitan Hotel enjoys a privileged location, only ten minute walk away from the Lisbon Zoo. The Hotel has 315 rooms with cosmopolitan and elegant dcor. The Wall Street Bar is the ideal place to relax after a day at work, to the sound of live piano.At the Astrolbio Restaurant you can savour the best in Portuguese cuisine or simply start off the day well with a hearty and varied buffet breakfast. The large private car park, spacious and quiet area in front of the hotel and two floors with 12 rooms for meetings and events make the SANA Metropolitan one of the best options in Lisbon for accommodating large groups or major events and meetings.iHotelier/iStay

name: Pestana Lisboa Vintage City Center Suites
address: Rua Braamcamp, 7, 1250-048 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Ideally set in the centre of Lisbon, Pestana Lisboa Vintage City Center Suites offers continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.7 km from Rossio. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms also feature a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a stovetop. Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.6 km from Pestana Lisboa Vintage City Center Suites, while Commerce Square is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Intercontinental Lisbon
address: Rua Castilho, 149, 1099-034 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Step into a world of contemporary luxury Next to the peaceful Eduardo VII Park, just above the Avenida da Liberdade and with views over the old city and the Tagus River, the InterContinental Lisbon offers a unique setting for your stay in Lisbon. We invite you to experience the comfort and laid-back elegance of our five-star hotel in Lisbon. Indulge in our unique rooms and suites with luxurious refinements, modern décor and views over Eduardo VII Park and Lisbon’s historic old town.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: room007 Select Liberdade
address: 5 Rua da Conceição da Glória, 1250-080 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Ideally situated in Lisbon, room007 Select Liberdade features a continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The property is allergy-free and is situated 700 metres from Rossio. All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. At room007 Select Liberdade the rooms include bed linen and towels. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English, Spanish and Portuguese. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Dona Maria II National Theatre, Commerce Square and St. George's Castle. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from room007 Select Liberdade.

name: Jam Lisbon
address: Avenida 24 de Julho Nr. 80, 1200-870 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: JAM Lisbon in Lisbon features 3-star accommodation with a terrace and a bar. Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers nightclub and a business centre. At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. At JAM Lisbon all rooms come with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. At JAM Lisbon you will find a restaurant serving African, Brazilian and Portuguese cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. You can play table tennis at this 3-star hotel. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Jeronimos Monastery is 4.5 km from the hotel, while Rossio is 5.4 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 11 km from JAM Lisbon.

name: Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show
address: Rua Sousa Martins nº 20, 1050-217 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show has a restaurant, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Lisbon. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. Every day, a videomapping show is performed in the interior garden of the hotel. Guests can enjoy this immersive experience of light and colour. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show every room includes bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show offers a sun terrace. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Rossio. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 5 km from Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show.

name: The Pessoa
address: Rua Trindade 1, 1200-092 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: No description found

name: NH Lisboa Campo Grande
address: Campo Grande 7, 1700-087 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Straddling the Campogrande and Entrecampos areas of Portugal’s capital city, the NH Lisboa Campo Grande hotel is just steps away from the University of Lisbon and Campo Grande Park, Lisbon’s largest green space. Located just a 10-minute drive or taxi ride away from the airport, the hotel also offers great connectivity to Lisbon’s highlights via public transport. Guests can catch the bus at the Entrecampos stop across the street and ride to the Parque das Nações shopping complex, Lisbon Oceanarium, Jerónimos Monastery, and Vasco da Gama Tower. The nearby Entre Campos and Roma Metro stops provide subway access to Baixa Pombalina, Lisbon’s city center, and Belém Tower. The hotel’s 88 modern rooms are modernly decorated with hardwood floors and offer a welcome retreat after a day of work or sightseeing with luxuriously think mattresses. Many of the rooms offer amazing views over the Campo Grande Park. Guests can recharge in the spa which includes a gym and two saunas. For dining, the hotel provides room service, or guests can enjoy breakfast or dinner at the Café do Campo Grande Restaurant. The restaurant offers a healthy breakfast buffet and at dinner, a wide selection of Portuguese and Mediterranean specialties. For a nightcap or aperitif, guests can sip wine, beer, or cocktails at the Café do Campo Grande Bar.NH Hoteles

name: Selina Secret Garden Lisbon
address: Beco Carrasco nº1, 1200-180 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Selina Lisbon is set in Lisbon, 100 metres from Bairro Alto. The property is primely located in Lisbon's centre, just a 5-minute walk from historic Chiado. The property features a variety of accommodation, ranging from apartments and studios, to double rooms. Some double rooms come with access to shared bathroom facilities. There are also fully equipped communal kitchens, which all guests of the property are welcome to use. Local restaurants are available at a short 5-minute walk. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. You can play table tennis at the guest house. Chiado is 800 metres from Selina Lisbon, while Rossio is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lisbon Portela Airport, 7 km from the property.

name: Pestana CR7 Lisboa
address: Rua do Comércio 54, 1100-150 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Pestana Hotels and world-renowned footballer Cristiano Ronaldo’s partnership resulted in the 4-star Pestana CR7 Lisboa, located in a traditional Lisbon building, which was fully renovated. Located in the historic centre, it is a 2-minute walk from Commerce Square. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel. Pestana CR7 has an Art Deco-style design and features double rooms with a modern bathroom, a large flat-screen TV, air conditioning, a minibar, a wardrobe and a safe. The on-site CR7 CORNER Bar&Bistro has an innovative cocktail selection, which were prepared by expert mixologists and can be enjoyed with ambiance music. The restaurant portion has a selection of tasty Portuguese delicacies and tapas, all within a casual and welcoming ambiance. Breakfast is served each morning in the restaurant area. The 24-hour front desk staff is always available to help out guests, including pertinent tips on the best spots to eat and visit in the vicinity. The CR7 CORNER bar is an ideal spot for guests to unwind at the end of the day and enjoy a drink or cocktail or their choosing. The hotel’s prime location makes it a great base from which to explore Lisbon. Rossio Square is at a 4-minute walk, while Chiado is within a 6-minute walk from the property. Bairro Alto and its trendy bars and shops at a 10-minute walk. Avenida da Liberdade’s shops and boutiques are at a 13-minute walk. Lisbon Portela Airport is 9.1 km away from Pestana CR7 Lisboa and is reachable via metro.

name: Castilho House
address: Rua Castilho, Nº 67 - 5º Andar, 1269-073 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Castilho House’s modern accommodations are located in Rua Castilho, right in Lisbon’s city centre, 450 metres from Marquês de Pombal Square and 100 metres from Eduardo VII Park. Rooms at House Castilho feature earthy tones and a trendy style. Each air-conditioned room offers free Wi-Fi, LED TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A breakfast buffet is served daily, and room service is available with drinks, snacks, and sandwiches. The reception offers luggage storage. Marquês de Pombal Metro Station is just 200 metres away, giving access to all the city’s sights. Lisbon International Airport is 7 km away.

name: Holiday Inn Express Lisbon - Plaza Saldanha
address: Avenida Joao Crisosomo No40 E, 1050-162 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Holiday Inn Express Lisbon Plaza Saldanha is conveniently located in the city centre, minutes away from Lisbon airport and downtown. The hotel provides the ideal starting point for exploring and connecting with the city's many experiences, making it perfect for either business or leisure guests. Stay in one of our 108 air-conditioned bedrooms, which have a comfy bed with a choice of pillows and nifty USB ports in the headboard. Easily find entertainment using the free Wi-Fi and 43 inch smart TV with a wide choice of stations, or catch up on work at the handy multi-function desk. The Express Bar and Cafe offers a variety of drinks and light snacks 24 hours a day. In the morning, take a seat and enjoy the Express Start Breakfast buffet with continental options at your own pace, all included in your room price, or just grab a coffee on the run. At Holiday Inn Express Lisbon Plaza Saldanha, we look forward to welcoming you.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Martinhal Lisbon Chiado
address: Rua Das Flores, 44, 1200-195 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in the heart of Lisbon, Martinhal Lisbon Chiado offers accommodation in the Chiado district, a 6-minute walk from the Cais do Sodré metro and train Station. Free WiFi is provided and a kids club is available at the property free of charge. Composed of 37 air-conditioned apartments, accommodation at Martinhal Lisbon Chiado range from studios to 2-bedroom apartments, all featuring wooden floors, a seating area with a sofa, a dining area and a private bathroom. Linen and towels are provided. In each apartment guests will find an equipped kitchen where meals can be prepared, fitted with an oven, a dishwasher, a refrigerator, a microwave, an electric kettle and a coffee machine. Alternatively, there is a wide range of restaurants and cafés in the vicinity. The lively Bairro Alto, offering various bars and eateries, is a 6-minute walk from the property, while Alfama, known for its Fado Houses and narrow streets, is 1.5 km away and the iconic São Jorge Castle is 1.8 km away. Lisbon International Airport is 10 km from Martinhal Lisbon Chiado.

name: Ibis Styles Lisboa Centro Liberdade NE
address: Av Duque De Loulé 73, 1050088 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: If you are looking for a hotel in Lisbon with a privileged location and good access to the entire city, the iIbis Styles Lisboa Centro Liberdade NE is perfect for you. With metro to the door, the hotel is only 4 minutes walk from the most emblematic avenue of the Portuguese capital, Av. da Liberdade and Marquês de Pombal Square, with excellent access to the main sights of the city.accorhotels.com

name: Vip Executive Art's
address: Avenida D. João II, 47, 1998-028 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The stylish and modern Vip Executive Arts Hotel is less than 500 metres from the Tagus waterfront and Feira Internacional de Lisboa. It is 3 minutes’ walk from Lisbon's Oriente transport hub. Private parking is available, at an extra fee. The spacious rooms and suites at this 4-star hotel are soundproofed and stylishly decorated. Some offer far-reaching views of the Tagus River and Vasco da Gama Bridge. The hotel also features 8 conference rooms and an auditorium with capacity for 165 people. Each morning guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet in the restaurant. For lunch and dinner, traditional Portuguese dishes and international cuisine are served. The VIP Executive Arts Hotel also boasts 1 bar where guests can relax with cocktails and drinks. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Portela International Airport is just 4 km away from VIP Executive Arts Hotel and is reachable via metro. The hotel is within a short walking distance of the Vasco da Gama Shopping Centre and the Altice Arena.

name: Hotel Real Palacio
address: Rua Tomas Ribeiro 115, 1050-228 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: A stay at Hotel Real Palacio places you in the heart of Lisbon, a 5-minute drive from Gulbenkian Museum and 13 minutes from Rossio Square. Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Avani Avenida Liberdade Lisbon Hotel
address: Rua Julio Cesar Machado 7-9, 1250-135 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Retreat to an urban oasis with the Avani Avenida Liberdade Lisbon Hotel in the heart of Lisbon. Located near the Portuguese Capital’s famed Baixa and Chiado districts, you’ll be minutes away from shops, bars, restaurants – plus many of the city’s best attractions. Visit the São Pedro de Alcântara viewpoint, take a walk around the Castelo São Jorge, or explore the greenery of the Parque Eduardo VII. Our 119 rooms bring the outside in with views over the subtropical garden, or Lisbon itself from private balconies. With Nespresso machines, Sky TV, Wi-Fi and more, our standard, Premier, Deluxe and Family rooms provide everything you need to relax. Escape the city bustle in our outdoor pool, complete with a pool bar, or work out in the AVANIFIT 24-hour fitness centre. Dine on some of the best food Lisbon has to offer at our Olivier Avenida restaurant, serving dishes designed by famed Portuguese chef Olivier da Costa and open all day. Just 20 minutes from Lisbon airport, our Palacete Conference and Events Centre can host congresses, parties or weddings. Our experienced team will help you run an unforgettable event from start to finish.NH Hoteles

name: Memmo Alfama - Design Hotels
address: Travessa das Merceeiras, 27 - Alfama, 1100-348 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in a refurbished, late 19th century building in the quaint Alfama district, Memmo Alfama – Design Hotel offers a 24-hour reception. It features a wine bar, an outdoor pool and Tagus River views. Rooms at Memmo Alfama have a design décor and include the latest equipment, as an iPod docking station and a LED flat-screen TV. Beds include Egyptian linen and 6 pillows. The bathroom comes with 100% cotton towels and free toiletries. A breakfast buffet is served daily in this design hotel, and there is a 24-hour honesty refrigerator with snacks and drinks. The wine bar on the 1st floor offers a perfect setting to enjoy a Portuguese wine and light meals while listening to Portuguese music and overlooking Tagus River. On arrival guests will find a comfortable living room where they can check-in. A concierge is available to give insight tips to explore the neighbourhood and Lisbon. This Memmo Alfama – Design Hotel celebrates Portuguese tradition and products. Complimentary walking tours of Alfama are also offered to guests of the hotel, pending previous request and availability. Surrounded by traditional restaurants with Fado music, this design hotel is a 5-minute walk from the panoramic São Jorge Castle. Lisbon International Airport is located at a 15-minute drive. Memmo Alfama is an EarthCheck certified property.

name: Memoria Lisboa Flh Hotels
address: Rua da Madalena 179, 1100-619 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Well situated in the centre of Lisbon, Memoria Lisboa FLH Hotels offers continental breakfast and free WiFi. The property is set 1.3 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 600 metres from St. George's Castle and 7.7 km from Luz Football Stadium. Jeronimos Monastery is 8.6 km away and Lisbon Oceanarium is 8.7 km from the hotel. At the hotel, the rooms come with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, the units at Memoria Lisboa FLH Hotels have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms come with a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near Memoria Lisboa FLH Hotels include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Commerce Square. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 6 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Be Poet Baixa Hotel
address: Rua Augusta, 220, 1100-056 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: With a prime location is Lisbon's historic downtown, Be Poet Baixa Hotel is just 600 metres from Chiado and 300 metres from Rossio Square. At just 140 metres from the Santa Justa Lift, the hotel is also 450 metres from Commerce Square and the Tagus River. All of the elegant units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, air conditioning and free WiFi. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. There is an on site restaurant, where guests will be able to taste Portuguese delicacies. The surrounding area is also filled with a variety of cafés, eateries and bars. Multilingual staff at the 24-hour front desk will be able to assist guests in booking an airport shuttle service, at an extra fee. Bairro Alto, the city's most popular nightlife hotspot, is 1.1 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7.4 km from Be Poet Baixa Hotel and is reachable via metro.

name: The Ivens, Autograph Collection
address: Rua Capelo 5, 1200-224 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The Ivens Hotel was home to the first luxury warehouse in the city in the XIX century as well as of the first Portuguese public. The iconic building is in every way representative of the XIX century, a period which has marked the spirit and culture of Lisbon. The hotel has 87 unique and comfortable rooms, of which ten are spacious suites including two signature top floor suites. The entrance was mapped to resemble the journey of Ivens and Capelo, two of greatest Portuguese explorers to unveil Africa back on the XIX century. The hotel holds three cinematic dining areas designed by Lázaro Rosa Violan who offer a journey through Italian cuisine, al fresco dining and a "Barra" area.Marriott

name: SANA Malhoa Hotel
address: Av. Jos Malhoa, 8, 1099-089 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located next to the business center of Lisbon and 5 minutes away from the El Corte Inglés Shopping Centre, the SANA Malhoa Hotel is perfect for both leisure and business travelers. The modern and comfortable rooms and suites offer everything you need to feel at home. There is also a SAYANNA WELLNESS & SPA - with SPA services and treatments, as well as a fully equipped Fitness Center. In the new Mediterranean Restaurant full of natural light, buffet breakfast is served and, for lunch and dinner, the best traditional Portuguese and Mediterranean flavours. The Lobby Bar space is perfect to work or relax with a snack or cocktail. The SANA Malhoa hotel also offers unique spaces for all kinds of business or social events.FarePortal

name: Esqina Cosmopolitan Lodge
address: Rua da Madalena 195, 1100-319 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in Lisbon, 600 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre, Esqina Cosmopolitan Lodge features views of the city. Featuring a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 1.5 km from the city centre and 500 metres from Rossio. All units in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Every room is equipped with a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while selected rooms have a balcony and some have river views. At Esqina Cosmopolitan Lodge each room comes with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and American options. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Commerce Square, Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and St. George's Castle. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 6 km from Esqina Cosmopolitan Lodge, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Cais Urban Lodge
address: Rua do Ferragial 31A, 1200-428 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Set in Lisbon, 1.9 km from the centre and 700 metres from Commerce Square, Cais Urban Lodge offers accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer in each unit, along with free toiletries. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Rossio, St. George's Castle and Dona Maria II National Theatre. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 9 km from Cais Urban Lodge.

name: Sant Jordi Hostels Lisbon
address: Rua do Forno do Tijolo 3, 1170-132 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: With a classical façade and a stunning traditional interior décor, the Sant Jordi Hostels Lisbon features a lush private garden and is located in Lisbon. It is 1.7 km from the high-end shops of Avenida da Liberdade and a 15-minute walk from historic Alfama. The hostel features accommodation in private double rooms and in dormitories, which can be mixed or gender-specific. Most rooms come with access to shared bathroom facilities, while some of the double rooms include their own private bathroom. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. Some rooms also have views over the garden area. The property's décor features renovated old ceilings, traditional tiles and even some chandeliers. A daily breakfast is served for guests of the Sant Jordi Hostels Lisbon, in the dining area. The on-site bar features refreshing beverages, which guests can enjoy while relaxing in the garden. Intendente Metro Station is a short 5-minute walk away and connects with the Lisbon centre and the historical downtown, both featuring a wide range of popular restaurants, cafés and eateries. The 24-hour front desk staff will be happy to help out guests and provide suggestions on the best spots in the vicinity. Nossa Senhora do Monte Belvedere is 700 metres away and provides sweeping views over the surroundings and over Lisbon's rooftops. Chiado is 2 km away, while lively Bairro Alto and its bars are 2.5 km from the property. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport is 6.6 km away and is reachable via metro.

name: Sana Capitol Hotel
address: Rua Eça de Queiroz, 24, 1050-096 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Next to Marqus de Pombal and just 15 minutes from Lisbon Airport, the hotel is located in an easy access area, either by car or public transport. The historic centre and the main business districts are just a few minutes walk.The SANA Capitol is the ideal hotel when travelling to Lisbon for business or pleasure. Each hotel room is appealing and truly unique. From the clean and relaxed rooms, to the modern and luminous bar or the sophisticated and cosmopolitan restaurant.iHotelier/iStay

The property is set 1.4 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 7 km from Jeronimos Monastery and 7.9 km from Luz Football Stadium. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from Commerce Square. At the hotel, all rooms come with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, all units at Tempo FLH Hotels Lisboa have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed. Popular points of interest near Tempo FLH Hotels Lisboa include Rossio, St. George's Castle and Dona Maria II National Theatre. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 8 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description: Featuring a fitness centre, a garden as well as a shared lounge, The Leaf Boutique Hotel Lisbon is located in the centre of Lisbon, 1.6 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The property is situated 2.4 km from Rossio, 1.9 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 3 km from Commerce Square. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a business centre and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. St. George's Castle is 3.2 km from the accommodation, while Luz Football Stadium is 5.9 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 6 km from The Leaf Boutique Hotel Lisbon.

description: EPIC SANA Marqus offers the elegant comfort of a contemporary accommodation, with 341 rooms and 38 suites, with many offering stunning views of Lisbons most significant landmarks. EPIC SANA Marqus envelops guests in a world of impeccable style and refinement. No matter the room category chosen, or the purpose of the stay, our guests can expect comfort and serenity during their stay in business, leisure, and family travel, as well as all modern conveniences and features in room, such as full bathrooms with luxury Aromatherapy Associates amenities, as well as a Nespresso coffee and tea station, LCD TVs and complimentary WI-FI access, amongst other features and amenitiesiHotelier/iStay

name: Melia Lisboa Oriente Hotel
address: Avenida D. João II,Lote 1.16.02B, 1990-083 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: This renovated hotel in the heart of Lisbon’s Parque das Naçoes is surrounded by trendy restaurants. It offers free Wi-Fi, a brand new restaurant and renovated spacious rooms. Private indoor parking is available on site, along with a charging station for electrical vehicles. Rooms at Melia Lisboa Oriente Hotel are bright and airy and have satellite TV, a seating area and a tea/coffee maker. They overlook the former EXPO 98 site and its many innovative buildings. Some rooms also look out over the water. The brand new restaurant serves international breakfasts and offers an à la carte service and a dish of the day, based on the Bistrô & Tapas concept. The famous Oceanarium and the Lisbon Casino are also close by. Lisbon city centre can be reached within 15 minutes using public transport. The Meliá Lisboa Oriente is a short walk from the Gare do Oriente station and is only 3 km from Lisbon International Airport. The area is well-served by Lisbon’s Metro as well as trains and buses.

name: The 8 Downtown Suites
address: Rua Da Vitória, 8, 1100-228 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in the heart of Lisbon city centre, The 8 - Downtown Suites is set in a refurbished 18th-century building in the Pombaline quarter. Sao Jorge Castle is within a 10-minute walk. The elegant rooms at the 8 are modern and include unique design pieces, such as paintings, Portuguese pottery, vintage furniture and design chairs. All air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed and have a private bathroom, equipped with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms feature a flat-screen TV, free WiFi, safe and a minibar. Each floor has a Nespresso coffee machine, and there is also a bar, where light meals are served. Guests are 700 metres from Bairro Alto, featuring a wide selection of restaurants and a vibrant nightlife. Staff at The 8 - Downtown Suites can organise tours, and car and bike rentals. Rossio is within a 5-minute walk, while the famed São Jorge Castle is at 400 metres. Popular Chiado is a 5-minute walk, while the nightlife of lively Bairro Alto is within an 8-minute walk. Guests arriving at Rossio Train Station are 8 minutes’ walking from The 8 Downtown Suites. Lisbon International Airport is around 7 km away.

address: 12 Travessa Monte do Carmo, 1200-244 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and free WiFi, as well as a Smart TV and Netflix. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a Select Comfort bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: The Late Birds Lisbon - Gay Urban Resort
address: Travessa André Valente 21, 1200-024 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: No description found

name: Hotel Dom Carlos Park
address: Avenida Duque De Loule,121, 1050-089 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Hotel Dom Carlos Park is primely located in central Lisbon, just 50 metres from Marquês de Pombal Metro Station, which connects with the city's historic downtown within 10 minutes. At 250 metres is Avenida da Liberdade. All of the hotel's rooms are air conditioned and have a flat-screen TV. Dom Carlos Park’s rooms also have bathrooms with a bathtub and a hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout. A buffet breakfast is served each morning until 11:30, at Dom Carlos’s Lounge, which also has a self -service bar. The lounge has a large plasma TV. Free WiFi is available throughout the entire hotel. Hotel Dom Carlos has a 24-hour reception, and its staff can help with restaurant reservations, car hire and ticket booking. An airport shuttle service is available, upon request and at an extra fee. Nearby Avenida da Liberdade is renowned for its high-end shops and boutiques. Rossio, Chiado and Commerce Square are at a short metro ride away. Bairro Alto is 20 minutes' walk away and features a multitude of popular bars and eateries. Lisbon International Airport is 6.4 km away from the Hotel Dom Carlos Park and is reachable via metro.

name: Evolution Lisboa Hotel
address: Praça do Duque de Saldanha, 4, 1050-094 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: EVOLUTION Lisboa is a design hotel with its doors open to modernity and completely turned to the life of the city. With an iconic faade that draws the eye, its spacious and well-equipped rooms offer an open view to Saldanha Square, one of the liveliest central areas of Lisbon. This new hotel generation is designed for the independent, tech savvy and flexible persons, like you. At EVOLUTION you are in total control of your stay, your meals, your free time, your work. You experience your stay the same way you live your life: the way you want to. We offer a home away from home experience. The difference? DJ's, urban art displays, comfortable and functional rooms where temperature, lights and curtains can be controlled through the hotels in-room flat-screen TV. And last but not least, with multimedia solutions as well as 24/7 ready to eat meals. All of this right at the heart of Lisbon.iHotelier/iStay

The property is located 1.5 km from St. George's Castle, 7.6 km from Luz Football Stadium and 7.7 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. Each room includes a balcony. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Upon Angels - Adults Only the rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near Upon Angels - Adults Only include Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Commerce Square. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

address: Rua Dos Anjos 1f, 1150-032 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Ideally situated in Lisbon, Be Lisbon Hostel Intendente features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. The property is around 1.8 km from Commerce Square, 1.4 km from St. George's Castle and 7.5 km from Luz Football Stadium. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. All rooms have bed linen. Guests at the hostel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near Be Lisbon Hostel Intendente include Rossio, Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and Dona Maria II National Theatre. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Eurostars Universal Lisboa
address: Avenida do D. Joao 11 (13), Lote 1.12.01, 1990-221 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The Eurostars Universal Lisboa is a recently inaugurated design hotel designed for a luxurious stay. It is located in the modern neighborhood of Parque das Nações, where the Expo was held in 1998, the main theme of which was the oceans. That is why the hotel is conceptually inspired by the wind rose, symbolized by an inner courtyard around which the wind blows, welcoming guests as if they were maritime travelers. These allusions to the sea can also be seen in its rooms, where dark woods and light tones intermingle with blue tones, with references to the most significant details of the capital of Lisbon. Designed to pamper your senses, the Eurostars Universal Lisboa is full of luxurious details and facilities, including an impressive swimming pool, a spa and gym area, meeting rooms and a restaurant where you can taste the best Portuguese cuisine. In addition, parking is available for your convenience. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a sauna. There is an on-site snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Lisbon Oceanarium is 400 metres from Eurostars Universal Lisboa, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 3 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel do Chiado
address: Rua Nova do Almada, 114, 1200-290 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: In the heart of Lisbon, do Chiado has free Wi-Fi and a rooftop terrace offering views of Sao Jorge Castle. The Elevador de Santa Justa is a 5-minute walk away. Also within walking distance is the Rossio Square, located in the city centre. The rooms at the 4-star do Chiado are bright and airy and feature panoramic views of Lisbon. Some rooms have spacious terraces, with tables and chairs. The Chiado serves a buffet breakfast consisting of a range of continental dishes. Guests can enjoy a 10% discount on snacks and refreshing drinks at the popular Entretanto Rooftop Bar, which overlooks the Tagus River. The Baixa/Chiado metro stop is a short walk away. Hotel do Chiado can also be reached via an airport shuttle.

description: Boasting a terrace, a restaurant as well as a bar, São Vicente Alfama Hotel by TRIUS Hotels is situated in the centre of Lisbon, less than 1 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The accommodation features evening entertainment and an ATM. All rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At São Vicente Alfama Hotel by TRIUS Hotels the rooms include bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St. George's Castle, Commerce Square and Rossio. name: Hf Fenix Lisboa
address: Praca Marques de Pombal, 8, 1269-133 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located on the central Marquês de Pombal, this non-smoking hotel features soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV and picturesque views of the city. At just 10 metres from a metro stop, the property offers free WiFi access, car rental services and organizes citywide tours. All rooms at HF Fénix Lisboa offer a well-lit work desk and have access to cable channels, including a variety of sports channels. Each air-conditioned room has its own safety deposit box. Espaço Jardim Restaurant serves Portuguese and European dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Coffee from a Nespresso machine is available in the mornings, while drinks or apéritif can be enjoyed on in the garden’s furnished terrace. The staff at Fénix Lisboa can arrange laundry pick-up and delivery services. Guests can also make use of the indoor parking facilities, which is open throughout the day (surcharges apply). HF Fénix Lisboa is a 10-minute drive from Bairro Alto’s entertainment venues. It is less than 100 metres away from Avenida da Liberdade’s designer shops and historic buildings.Parque Eduardo VII is across the street from the property. Reachable via metro, Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport is 7.7 km from the hotel.

name: Lutecia Smart Design Hotel
address: Avenida Frei Miguel Contreiras, 52, 1749-086 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Set in the residential area of Avenida de Roma, this 4-star design hotel was recently renovated and features 9 themed floors, as well as a fusion restaurant serving Portuguese cuisine. The Roma-Areeiro Metro Station is about 200 meters away. The guest rooms of Lutecia Smart Design Hotel include high-tech furniture, such as design chairs and Smart TVs. All rooms come with an espresso coffee machine and most offer panoramic city views. The suites include a comfortable living area and a luxurious bathroom with a spa bath. InFusion restaurant offers à la carte dining in a modern atmosphere. The menu includes several vegetarian alternatives. Lutecia’s room service enables guests to enjoy their meals privately. In the morning, you can enjoy an expansive buffet breakfast featuring hot dishes, fresh fruit and cakes. A selection of beverages and light snacks is available at the lobby bar, together with several large flat-screen TVs. Lutecia Smart Design Hotel is located close to the lively Avenida de Roma. Rossio Square and the Baixa are a short ride on the Green Metro Line.

name: Olissippo Lapa Palace
address: Rua do Pau da Bandeira, 4, 1249-021 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Olissippo Lapa Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World is situated in Lisbon and offers complimentary wireless internet. It provides 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The hotel treats guests to a range of superior amenities and services, including an indoor pool and Lapa Palace Spa. Couples will delight in the hotel's features like vip rooms and massage services. It also has a gym with a swimming pool and cardiovascular equipment. Each room at Olissippo Lapa Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World comes with slippers and a mini bar, and the bathrooms offer bathrobes and hair dryers. They are all soundproofed and include a DVD player, an in-room safe and a desk. Those staying at Olissippo Lapa Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World can enjoy a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay nearby at mealtime. Each evening, guests are invited to wind down in the lounge bar. The hotel also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the breakfast room, or there is a variety of popular restaurants and cafés in the local area to discover. Olissippo Lapa Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World is also moments from the area's well-known establishments, and the National Museum of Ancient Art is a 10-minute stroll away. This completely non-smoking hotel has 112 rooms, free WiFi, paying indoor car park, buffet breakfast and 24-hour bar and snack service.accorhotels.com

name: Moxy Lisbon City
address: Avenida Duque Loule No 2 A 8, 1050-090 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Discover a hotel in the center of Lisbon, with modern design and chic, well-appointed rooms.The spacious lobby with contemporary furnishings is the perfect place to meet and relax. Our "Plug and Meet" areas offer modern ergonomic seating for working and free wifi.At Moxy Lisbon City enjoy our catering service 24/7, we offer a continental breakfast, snacks, an evening bar with typical Portuguese wines and local beers.All Moxy's rooms have 49-inch flat-screen TVs, built-in USB ports and free Wi-Fi.Not to mention our rooftop swimming pool to relax and enjoy the view over Lisbon City or our terrace for a quiet drink after your day of visits.Moxy Lisbon City is the ideal starting point to explore: Belém, Castelo de São Jorge, and all the miradouros one many hills of the city. on foot or by streetcar!We will be happy to advise you on where to go to listen to fado while enjoying some Portuguese tapas and of course the typical bacalhau, and ending with a pastel de nata. Got your tickets!Tight parking on site.Marriott

name: York House
address: 32, Rua Das Janelas Verdes, 1200-691 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Housed in a converted Carmelite Convent, this hotel is located a 10-minute walk from Lisbon's city centre. It combines chic, contemporary furnishings with traditional, 17th-century architecture. York House offers air-conditioned guest rooms with elegant fittings and free Wi-Fi. When weather is nice, the picturesque garden is also available for a refreshing drink. York House provides an airport shuttle and a car-rental service at an extra charge. The reception is available 24 hours, and the popular shopping area of Amoreiras is 2 km from the hotel.

name: Tivoli Avenida Liberdade Lisboa
address: Avenida Liberdade, 185, 1269-050 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Experience a piece of history when you stay at the first-ever Tivoli Hotel in Lisbon. Tivoli Avenida Liberdade Lisboa Hotel first opened its doors in 1933 and is famous for being the home of late Portuguese actress and icon, Beatriz Costa, for over 30 years. Located in the heart of the Portuguese capital, on the city’s most luxurious avenues, you’ll be within walking distance of the city’s hotspots. Visit the majestic Castelo de São Jorge, take the Glória Funicular up to the São Pedro de Alcântara viewpoint, or spend a day exploring stylish shops, bars and restaurants. Our newly refurbished rooms offer an oasis of calm and views of Avenida da Liberdade, the Tagus River or the secluded patio. Our room amenities include Nespresso machines and Wi-Fi. Suites and connecting rooms are available for families, with the Anantara Spa and exclusive outdoor pool perfecting the mood of relaxation. Dine in style at SEEN Lisboa rooftop restaurant, serving signature cocktails and delicious food – from Wagyu beef to locally sourced oysters. The more traditional Cervejaria Liberdade, known for its fish and seafood, is open all day. Just a 15-minute drive from the airport, our congress center is the perfect place to host your event. Our experienced conference and events team will ensure everything runs smoothly.NH Hoteles

name: Pestana Palace Lisboa
address: Rua Jau 54, 1300-314 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The 5-star Pestana Palace Hotel is a restored 19th-century palace, featuring private parklands and views of the Tagus River. It offers 2 swimming pools, a sauna and wellness centre. Each spacious room is elegantly furnished and fitted with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Many also open onto a furnished balcony with views of the lush garden. Some feature a seating area with a plush sofa. Overlooking the gardens, the chic, sophisticated restaurant at Pestana Palace Hotel & National Monument serves traditional Portuguese dishes. The bar offers a range of snacks and drinks. In the summer months, a poolside restaurant also serves light refreshments. Pestana Palace Hotel & National Monument offers a steam bath and a hot tub. It features a business centre as well. Close attractions include Belém Tower, 3 km away, while Hieronimyte Museum is 2 minutes’ drive from Pestana Palace. As a sustainability measure, the indoor pool's water will only be heated to 26ºC.

name: easyHotel Lisbon
address: R. de Santa Marta 60, 1150-006 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in Lisbon, 1.3 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, easyHotel Lisbon features views of the city. The 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 1.5 km from Rossio. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. At easyHotel Lisbon each room comes with bed linen and towels. Staff speak English, Spanish and Portuguese at the 24-hour front desk. Commerce Square is 2.8 km from the accommodation, while St. George's Castle is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from easyHotel Lisbon.

name: Hf Fenix Music
address: Rua Joaquim António de Aguiar, 5, 1050-010 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located at the centre of Lisbon, HF Fenix Music is a charming themed hotel, with a rooftop swimming pool and far-reaching city views from its terrace. The brand-new hotel is a 4-minute walk from posh Avenida da Liberdade. All the elegant rooms at the HF Fenix feature a musical theme, visible in its furnishings, colour patterns, decorated walls and even in its architecture. Each air-conditioned room is soundproofed and comes equipped with a Bluetooth sound system, multicoloured dynamic lightning, a wall-mounted flat-screen cable TV, safe and a desk. Also included are a private bathroom with free toiletries, as well as free WiFi access. The lobby bar and the rooftop lounge bar have a variety of refreshments and snacks on offer. Some of Lisbon’s restaurants are within easy reach, at a 5-minute walk. Marquês de Pombal Metro Station is just 110 metres away and provides connections with most of the city. Eduardo VII Park is 400 metres away. Nearby Avenida da Liberdade is filled with high-end shops and boutiques. Chiado and Rossio are historical areas which guests may reach through a 15-minute Metro ride. Lisbon’s Portela International Airport is 7.7 km away from the HF Fenix Music.

name: Holiday Inn Express Lisbon - Av. Liberdade
address: Rua Alexandre Herculano no. 40, 1250-011 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Comfortable City Centre Lisbon hotel near Avenida da Liberdade, with free Wi-Fi and included breakfast. Holiday Inn Express® Lisbon - Av. Liberdade hotel is within walking distance of numerous shops and restaurante. The hotel is 300 metres from Marquês de Pombal Metro Station, which is also a departure point for buses and sightseeing coach tours. It's a 25-minute walk or five-minute drive to the nightlife district of Bairro Alto, with its vibrant cafés and fado bars, and the elegant shopping quarter of Chiado. St. George's Castle, a splendid Moorish fortress with panoramic views over the Tagus River, is 3 km away. For business visitors, the hotel's flexible meeting room is ideal for seminars or gatherings for up to 50 people. The hotel is less than 30 minutes by car or public transport from Lisbon Airport (LIS). At this hotel you can enjoy: - Free Wi-Fi throughout the building - A continental Express Start Breakfast included in the rate - A Business Centre - Sheltered off-site parking nearby Stylish rooms come with pillow menus, a work desk and an LCD TV, and generous windows let in plenty of natural light. You can make a hot drink at your leisure with complimentary in-room tea and coffee, and there are plenty of restaurants nearby. After an exciting day exploring the city, drop by the hotel's 24-hour lobby bar for late-night nibbles and drinks.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Browns Boutique Hotel
address: Rua Da Vitoria 88, 1100-619 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: With elegantly decorated accommodation, Browns Boutique Hotel & Apartments offers a central location in Lisbon, a 5-minute walk from Chiado and Bairro Alto. It includes free WiFi access and designer furniture. All units are air-conditioned and include private marble bathroom. Some are equipped with an iMac computer and an iPad. Kitchenette facilities are featured in some accommodation. The surrounding area is filled with restaurants, cafes and shops, and the well-known 28 tram stops 50 metres from the hotel. Browns Boutique Hotel & Apartments is 100 metres from Baixa-Chiado Metro Station, offering connections throughout Lisbon. Rossio Railway Station is 600 metres and has a 40-minute train link to Sintra (a UNESCO World Heritage Site).

name: Residentas Arco do Bandeira

name: Turim Terreiro Do Paço Hotel
address: Rua do Comércio, 9, 1100-149 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: At 250 metres from Commerce Square and just 350 metres from Terreiro do Paço Metro Station, this 4-star Lisbon hotel is a short walk from the Tagus River. Chiado and Rossio are both at an 8-minute walk. Featuring single, twin and double rooms, the central TURIM Terreiro do Paço Hotel features comfortable and modern accommodation with a private bathroom. Each room has a a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and free WiFi access. Breakfast service is available each morning and is served in the restaurant area. The hotel’s à la carte restaurant has a varied menu with Portuguese and international specialities that guests can savour for lunch and/or dinner. A variety of local eateries is available nearby, within a short walk. The TURIM Terreiro do Paço features a 24-hour front desk, as well as dry cleaning, ironing and laundry services. Guests are welcome to enjoy a refreshing cocktail at the bar or relax in the lounge area. Nearby, Rossio features traditional cafés and restaurants, while Chiado has a variety of typical shops. Bairro Alto is a 15-minute walk and is the city’s most renowned nightlife area, filled with bars and after-hours restaurants. The iconic São Jorge Castle is 700 metres away. The TURIM Terreiro do Paço Hotel is 9 km from Lisbon International Airport, which is reachable via a paid airport shuttle service or through the nearby metro station.

name: Lisboa Pessoa Hotel
address: Rua da Oliveira ao Carmo, 8, 1200-309 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Inspired by the life and work of Fernando Pessoa, Lisboa Pessoa Hotel is located in the centre of Lisbon, 200 metres from Chiado. The Hotel features a restaurant with panoramic views, a SPA (16+) and fitness centre, meeting facilities and a library. Free WiFi and paid private parking are available. Lisboa Pessoa Hotel offers a variety of rooms, including interconnecting rooms, rooms with a terrace and stunning views of Lisbon. All rooms have air conditioning, a safe and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each bathroom includes free toiletries and a walk-in shower. The reception is available 24 hours. The hotel has free Wi-Fi. Restaurante Mensagem provides an intimate atmosphere with eight niches with a private window and 2 terraces with views of the Portuguese capital. The products are carefully selected by Chef Manuel Ferreira and the dishes are inspired by Portuguese tradition. Lisboa Pessoa Hotel is 200 meters from Rossio and 300 meters from Dona Maria II National Theater. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

name: Myriad By Sana Hotels
address: Cais Das Naus, Lote 2.21.01, 1990-173 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: With a unique location in the city of Lisbon, overlooking the Tagus River, the Myriad by SANA is a sophisticated and luxurious hotel, member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts.176 rooms and 10 suites, with unparalleled views over the Tagus River and Parque das Naes, combined with a contemporary design and unique facilities, redefine the concept of luxury hotel. The interior public spaces are continued into the horizon by the ever present views over the Tagus River. A restaurant with river view, bar, SPA and indoor swimming pool are just a part of what the Myriad has at your disposal. For meetings and events, the Myriad has 3 meeting rooms and, connected to the hotel by a covered aerial bridge, a modern Conference and Event Centre with another 7 meeting rooms, 5 boardrooms, foyer and terrace, in a total of 1,690 m2.iHotelier/iStay
