description: Boasting a terrace, a restaurant as well as a bar, TURIM Boulevard Hotel is set in the centre of Lisbon, less than 1 km from Rossio. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is allergy-free and is located less than 1 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. TURIM Boulevard Hotel offers some units that feature a balcony, and every room has a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at TURIM Boulevard Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Commerce Square is 1.8 km from the hotel, while St. George's Castle is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from TURIM Boulevard Hotel.

name: Ikonik Lisboa
address: Avenida do Mediterrâneo, Lote 1.12.04, 1990-221 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Ideally situated in the Parque das Nacoes district of Lisbon, Ikonik Lisboa is located 600 metres from Lisbon Oceanarium, 7.8 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 8.6 km from Commerce Square. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is situated 800 metres from Gare do Oriente. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Ikonik Lisboa the rooms have bed linen and towels. Rossio is 8.7 km from the accommodation, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 8.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 3 km from Ikonik Lisboa.

name: Lisbon 5 Hotel
address: Rua da Palma 284, 1100-390 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Conveniently set in Lisbon, Lisbon 5 Hotel provides a buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 1.4 km from St. George's Castle, 7.7 km from Luz Football Stadium and 7.8 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Popular points of interest near Lisbon 5 Hotel include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Commerce Square. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 6 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Ritz Lisbon
address: Rua Rodrigo Da Fonseca, 88, 1099-039 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Featuring a fitness centre on the 11th floor with an outdoor running track overlooking Lisbon, the 5-star Four Seasons Hotel Ritz Lisbon is located next to Eduardo VII Park. It offers a spa on site. Luxurious and spacious, each room at the Ritz features an elegant décor with classic elements. Some rooms have large balconies, and all private bathrooms come with free L’Occitane toiletries. Start your day with a lavish breakfast buffet, served daily at the stylish Varanda Restaurant, offering unparalleled views over the park. During the warmer months, enjoy a cocktail at the Ritz Bar’s summer terrace. In-room dining options are available 24 hours, and guests can enjoy sushi on select days of the week. Guests wishing to pamper themselves can enjoy treatments as acupuncture and lymphatic drainage or Ayurvedic rituals at the spa. The indoor swimming pool overlooks the hotel gardens and Lisbon's Eduardo VII Park. The trendy Avenida da Liberdade is less than 10 minutes’ walking from the Four Seasons Hotel, and the iconic São Jorge Castle is within 4 km. The friendly and attentive staff is always ready to help, and exclusive concierge services are available at the Four Seasons Hotel Ritz Lisbon. There is a shuttle service to Lisbon International Airport, located 7 km from the hotel.

name: BessaHotel Liberdade
address: Avenida da Liberdade, 29, 1250-139 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: BessaHotel Liberdade is centrally located in Lisbon’s prestigious Avenida da Liberdade, a few minutes’ from Restauradores Square. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The air-conditioned luxurious rooms of BessaHotel are decorated in a modern style. All rooms have a work desk and a satellite/cable flat screen TV with Chromecast connectivity and video on demand. Some rooms have balconies with views of the city. Featuring a 24-hour reception, BessaHotel provides a business centre and therapeutic massages upon request. The wellness area at BessaHotel Liberdade is comprised of an indoor pool, a sauna, a Turkish bath and a fitness centre. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and laundry facilities. BessaHotel Liberdade is 500 metres from Rossio and 700 metres from the commercial area of Chiado. The Restauradores Metro Station is 300 metres away and Lisbon International Airport is 6 km away.

name: PortoBay Liberdade
address: Rua Rosa Araújo, 8, 1250-195 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: PortoBay Liberdade is the Lisbon five-star hotel from the PortoBay Group. Situated in Rua Rosa Arajo, 60 metres from Avenida da Liberdade, the most luxurious avenue in Portugal and right in the city centre. This boutique hotel, with 98 rooms, has the characteristics of an urban resort. An indoor swimming pool and gymnasium, SPA with treatment rooms for two, sauna, Turkish steam bath, esplanade, patio, terrace and verandas in most rooms. With a focus on technology, and with different reasons for travelling in mind, the hotel's rooms, meeting rooms and gym are equipped with a number of different technology facilities. The hotel also provides tablets. Built from scratch by PortoBay Hotels & Resorts, this project by Architect Frederico Valsassina preserves the historic faade of the palaces of Lisbon from the turn of the 20th Century, in a blend between the old and contemporary.iHotelier/iStay

name: Lisboa Prata Boutique Hotel
address: Rua da Prata, 116, 1100-420 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Set in a renovated 18th century building that maintains all of its original charm, Lisboa Prata Boutique Hotel is centrally located in Baixa Pombalina. The property features accommodation in classic double rooms and premium double or twin rooms. All rooms feature a private bathroom and some offer views over the streets of Lisbon. They feature soundproofed windows, air conditioning, free WiFi, minibar and a flat-screen cable TV. An à la carte breakfast is available in the Chiado Room, at an extra fee and at the guests' desired time. For lighter meals and snacks, there is a snack bar available with an assortment of choices. Room breakfast is possible, for an extra fee. A bar is also available, where refreshing drinks are served, which can be enjoyed in the relaxing environment of the communal lounge area. Babysitting services are available, at an extra fee. Car rental services are also available at the front desk. The traditional Alfama neighbourhood is a 13-minute walk away and features several establishments where guests can enjoy Portuguese tapas and wine while watching a live Fado concert. Lisbon International Airport is around 9 km from Lisboa Prata Boutique Hotel.

name: Dear Lisbon - Bordalo Palace Chiado
address: Largo Rafael Bordalo Pinheiro, 31, 1200-108 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Dear Lisbon Bordalo House features tastefully decorated rooms and suites set in Lisbon's historic downtown area, a short walk from Chiado and the Carmo Church. It is a traditional 19th century home, renovated to combine modern comfort with historic original details and pieces. This bed and breakfast has a concierge service and free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms and suites are decorated with warm colours and tastefully selected furnishings. Each unit is fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, a private bathroom and free toiletries. All include air conditioning and a desk. Each morning, guests will be able to enjoy a buffet breakfast, in the property's meal area. The surrounding area features an assortment of options for guests to experience Portuguese specialities, with many bakeries, restaurants and popular cafés within a short walking distance. The iconic Santa Justa Lift is within 400 metres, Popular points of interest near the accommodation include the trendy Bairro Alto, the high-end shops of Liberty Avenue and the riverfront Commerce Square. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

name: The Lift Apartments By Ridan Hotels
address: Rua do Carmo, 90, 1200-093 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Conveniently located in Lisbon, The Lift Apartments by RIDAN Hotels offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a sun terrace. The property is allergy-free and is set 700 metres from Commerce Square. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At The Lift Apartments by RIDAN Hotels all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Rossio, St. George's Castle and Dona Maria II National Theatre. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 8 km from The Lift Apartments by RIDAN Hotels, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Palacete Chafariz Del Rei - by Unlock Hotels

name: Casas de São Bento
address: Rua Correia Garção, 3, 1200-640 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Casas de Sao Bento features air-conditioned rooms and self-catering apartments, each with a flat-screen TV in the Misericordia district of Lisbon. The property is located 300 metres from Bairro Alto and 1 km from Chiado. Staff on site can arrange airport transfers. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at the guest house also boast free WiFi, while some rooms are fitted with a garden view. Guests booking the apartments will also be able to enjoy their own kitchen and dining area. Liberty Avenue is 1.2 km from Casas de Sao Bento, while Rossio is 1.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Monte Belvedere Hotel by Shiadu
address: Rua Santa Catarina 17, 1200-012 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Monte Belvedere by Shiadu is in the heart of Lisbon and offers air-conditioned rooms, some featuring river views. São Bento Palace, the Chiado Museum and Santos Railway Station are within 1 km. The rooms are decorated with wooden parquet floors and white painted walls. Each room includes a seating area with a cable TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms can accommodate a baby cot, at an extra fee. A breakfast buffet is served daily with a variety of choices including crepes, fresh fruit and juices. Free WiFi is available. The Monte Belvedere by Shiadu's staff can provide guests a free walking tour. The Bairro Alto and Bica Funicular Railway are less than 10 minutes’ walk from Monte Belvedere by Shiadu and Baixa-Chiado Metro Station is 15 minutes’ walk away.

name: Hotel Acores Lisboa
address: Av. Columbano Bordalo Pinheiro N.º 3, 1070-060 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Situated in in a prime location in Praça de Espanha, a short stroll to the Metro Station, 4-star Hotel Açores Lisboa has a 24-hour reception and provides quick access to Lisbon city centre. It features a permanent exhibition of Azorean photographer Cristina Ataíde. The air-conditioned rooms at the Açores Lisboa Hotel are decorated in a contemporary style and come with a minibar, cable TV and safety deposit box. The private bathrooms include wooden floors and free toiletries. Free WiFi access is provided throughout the hotel. Modern Atlântida Restaurant serves a range of international and regional Portuguese dishes and room service can be ordered. A variety of beverages are available at the bar, which is decorated with stools and sofas. Lisbon’s New University, the Calouste Gulbenkian Museum and El Corte Inglés Mall are a 10-minute walk away from the hotel. Lisbon Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Saldanha Pool & Garden

name: Independente Príncipe Real
address: Rua São Pedro De Alcântara 81, 1250-238 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: This Art Deco hostel is within a renovated palace and overlooks São Pedro de Alcântara and Tagus River. Set on the border of Lisbon's trendy Bairro Alto district, it provides free WiFi and a restaurant with a secluded beer garden. The Independente provides modern dormitory rooms and private suites with classical Portuguese architecture and a distinct décor and feel. All rooms have seating areas and high ceilings. Some offer balconies with river views. Guests have access to communal kitchen facilities and to a shared lounge area. Modern Portuguese cuisine can be enjoyed in the Art Deco setting of the Decadente Restaurante & Bar. All meals and cocktails are prepared with locally sourced produce. Elevador da Gloria Tram Stop is situated right opposite Independente Príncipe Real. Pink Street, a renowned nightlife hotspot near Cais do Sodré, is 900 metres away. The Portela Airport is 8 km away, while the Caparica beaches can be found 20 km from the hostel. Lisbon International Airport is at a 25-minute drive from the property.

name: Emporium Lisbon Suites
address: Rua Dos Bacalhoeiros 18, 1100-070 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and an LED TV. Other amenities include towels, an electric kettle, kitchenware and utensils, and tour/ticket assistance.Expedia

name: Corinthia Lisbon
address: Avenida Columbano Bordalo Pinheiro, 105, 1099-031 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The 5-star Corinthia Hotel Lisbon is 150 metres from the Lisbon Zoo Metro Station and a 5-minute metro ride from trendy Avenida da Liberdade. A recent recipient of environmental awards, it features 2 restaurants and the largest spa area in Lisbon. All of the stylish, air-conditioned rooms at the 5-star Corinthia Hotel Lisbon have been tastefully decorated and fitted with cable TVs, as well as free WiFi. Each has a private bathroom with free luxury toiletries. The hotel's Soul Garden - Outdoor Restaurant and Cocktail Bar has a colourful and tranquil ambiance, serving light meals, snacks, refreshing drinks and cocktails. The hotel's main restaurant, is the Erva Restaurant and Bar, which was recently fully renovated. The restaurant is inspired by Lisbon and Portuguese gastronomy, has a relaxed atmosphere and even includes a grill bar area, for live cooking. Guests can relax at the hotel’s large, 3000 m2 luxury spa. It offers massage therapies and beauty treatments, such as mesotherapy and facial treatments as well as an aqua circuit with swimming pools, hot tubs and a fully equipped gym. The ample Sky Lounge is located on the 24th floor and features a 360º view over the city. Here, guests may enjoy using the business centre with free WiFi, reading daily newspapers or magazines, tasting complimentary canapés, as well as soft drinks, coffee and tea throughout the day. The unit is a 15-minute Metro ride from the city’s historical downtown, featuring popular Chiado and Rossio. Lively Bairro Alto’s bars are also at a 15-minute Metro ride. The iconic São Jorge Castle is within 7.5 km. Lisbon’s premier shopping area, Amoreiras is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Lisbon International Airport is a 9-minute drive from Corinthia Hotel Lisbon.

name: Behotelisboa
address: Rua dos Correeiros, 136, 1100-168 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Behotelisboa offers accommodation in Lisbon’s historic Pombaline Downtown and is located just 50 metres away from Rua Augusta, Lisbon’s main shopping street. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each room at Behotelisboa has a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free toiletries. Breakfast is available and is served next door at Taberna 132 restaurant. Daily cleaning is provided and room service is also available. Please note that when booking more than 7 rooms, different policies and conditions may apply. Guests will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and bike hire and car hire are available. There is a variety of restaurants available in the surroundings and Rossio and Chiado are a 5-minute walk from behotelisboa. Lively Bairro Alto is 1.1 km away while iconic Alfama is 1.2 km away and is renowned for its many Fado Houses, where guests can enjoy Portuguese food while watching Fado concerts.The nearest airport is Lisbon International Airport, 7 km from the property.

name: NH Collection Lisboa Liberdade
address: Avenida da Liberdade 180 B, 1250-146 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The NH Collection Lisboa Liberdade, an elegant and newly renovated hotel, is directly situated on Avenida de Liberdade. Conveniently located in the Tivoli Forum area, Lisbon Airport is just 5 km away. For guests seeking local tourist attractions, São Jorge Castle is only 2 km away, while the Chiado Museum and the Santa Maria Maior de Lisboa cathedral are a short walk from NH Collection Lisboa Liberdade. The 83 modern rooms decorated with bright colors and hardwood floors feature luxurious mattresses and a choice of pillows. Some rooms offer amazing views of the São Jorge Castle and the Tagus River. Guests can enjoy a healthy and balanced breakfast buffet including fruits, yogurts and breads. The hotel’s Restaurante Do Teatro offers a selection of international, local and Mediterranean cuisine and a cozy lobby bar invites guests to cocktails, wine and light meals. For a panoramic view during the warmer season the Ático by NH bar is located on the 11th floor and has a rooftop pool with lounge chairs, towels and a bar that serves drinks and light meals. The hotel’s multi-function room can accommodate up to 40 people and is fully equipped for business events as well as private parties.NH Hoteles

name: NAU Palácio do Governador
address: Rua Bartolomeu Dias, 117, 1400-030 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: NAU Palacio do Governador offers accommodation in Lisbon’s Belem district, 400 metres from the Belem Cultural Centre and the Belem Tower. Featuring a Spa & Wellness centre, the hotel also has an outdoor year-round pool, an indoor pool, free WiFi and private parking available. Guests can find a garden and a terrace at the property. Each room is air conditioned and equipped with a private bathroom and a satellite flat-screen TV. Breakfast is included and guests will find bath robes and slippers in the rooms. A library and a lounge area are also available. A bar where guests can relax at the end of the day and an à la carte restaurant are featured. Alternatively, guests can find restaurants and cafés within 150 metres. The famous Pastéis de Belém café can be found within 1 km. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and concierge service. Public transport stops can be found within 40 metres. Lisbon’s lively Bairro Alto and the Chiado districts are 7 km from the property. Sintra is 25 km from NAU Palacio do Governador and Cascais is 27 km away. The nearest airport is Lisbon International Airport, 16 km away from NAU Palacio do Governador.

description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and an LCD TV, as well as air conditioning and daily housekeeping. Other amenities include towels, tour/ticket assistance, a safe, and access to a safety deposit box.Expedia

name: Hotel Gat Rossio
address: Rua Do Jardim Do Regedor 27-35, 1150-193 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Providing ultra modern rooms with total-white designer furnishings, Gat Rossio is centrally located on a quiet street behind Restauradores Square and metro stop. It features an outdoor terrace and free Wi-Fi access. Rooms are air conditioned and include flat-screen TV sets with cable channels. Some rooms open out onto balconies, while all come with a work desk and en suite bathroom facilities. Guests at Hotel Gat Rossio can benefit from the location and discover many nearby eateries, serving traditional dishes from Lisbon’s rich gastronomy. The iconic St George’s Castle is within a 10-minute walk, and Rossio Train Station is 50 meters from the Gat Rossio hotel. The Aerobus Shuttle from Portela Airport stops just a few metres from the property’s doorstep. It is only 4 minutes’ walk to the Av. da Liberdade.

description: Located on Duque de Palmela Street, it is right around the corner from Marqus de Pombal square and just a few steps away from Avenida da Liberdade, near the city's main accesses (100 m from the metro) and a pleasant walk from the city's main attractions. The hotel has 67 rooms. These include junior suites, family rooms and family suites providing comfort and the ideal space for families and those seeking well-being. The facilities at PortoBay Marqus make you feel right at home. The atmosphere is intimate. Neutral colours are reinforced by warm, welcoming, light-coloured woods which invite you to stay. and enjoy.iHotelier/iStay

name: Sheraton Lisboa Hotel & Spa
address: Rua Latino Coelho, 1, 1069 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: At Sheraton Lisboa Hotel & Spa, you're at the very center of all Lisbon has to offer. Take advantage of our central city location in the gorgeous ancient capital of Portugal, with unbeatable access to the city's finest dining, cultural and historic attractions. Relax in our comfortable, modern luxury hotel accommodations, with luxurious bedding, marble bathrooms and a full in-room entertainment package. Experience the city's food scene with our in-house dining options, including Portuguese-style tapas and local dishes, or drop by our rooftop to gaze out at the Lisbon waterfront. Refresh your senses with a swim in our elegant outdoor pool or a pampering visit to our day spa. Ready to venture out from our Lisbon hotel? You'll love our easy access to the city center by car, by metro, and on foot. Our 5-star hotel's location also makes it ideal for hosting your business meeting or conference in Lisbon - explore our flexible, 13,000-square-foot event space. Sheraton Lisboa Hotel & Spa, RNET: Nº 802.Marriott

name: ibis Lisboa Centro Liberdade
address: Rua Barata Salgueiro 53, 1250-043 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Hotel ibis Lisboa Centro Liberdade is great for business or leisure alike. A privileged location for the historical center and districts such as Bairro Alto, Chiado and Marquês de Pombal - just 3 minutes by foot - served by public transportation for easy access to main roads. A 100% non-smoking hotel with 70 rooms, plus bar, covered parking and free WiFi.accorhotels.com

name: 1908 Lisboa Hotel
address: Largo do Intendente Pina Manique, 6, 1100 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Centrally located in Lisbon, the 4-star 1908 Lisboa Hotel is housed in a completely renovated 1908 award-winning building by architect Adães Bermudes. Set in the corner of the Almirante Reis Avenue and Intendente Square, this hotel includes an ever evolving art gallery, a restaurant and a bar. Featuring an art nouveau décor and unique contemporary pieces by Portuguese artists invited to reinterpret the building to the present day, 1908 Lisboa Hotel provides free WiFi throughout. Rooms offer French balconies with views of the square or the avenue. Private bathrooms come with a shower, free Castelbel™ toiletries, slippers and robes. Breakfast is included in the rate and served at the Infame Restaurant which offers a Portuguese-base kitchen with multicultural influences. Guests are welcome to relax at the hotel’s bar which features unique pieces and a welcoming ambience. The Intendente neighbourhood offers a variety of cafés, restaurants and bars with live music. 1908 Lisboa Hotel’s staff will gladly share tips to visit the city and alternatives to what is available in most tourist guides. The Intendente Metro Station is 2-minute walk away and Lisbon International Airport is 5 km away.

name: Portugal Boutique Hotel
address: Rua Joao Das Regras, 4, Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Featuring a rooftop terrace, Portugal Boutique Hotel is situated in Lisbon and is a short stroll from Castle of Sao Jorge and Rossio Square. It also offers a laundry service and free Wi-Fi. There are 53 rooms at the hotel, each offering all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. After settling in to their room, guests can explore the area with use of Rossio Railway Station, which is a brief stroll from the hotel. Guests staying at Portugal Boutique Hotel can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay nearby at mealtime. In the evening, guests can wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide choice of eating options are also found in the surrounding area. Portugal Boutique Hotel is conveniently situated for exploring Lisbon with Lisbon Cathedral, Santa Justa Lift and Chiado within walking distance. Guests can also visit Bairro Alto.Revato

name: B in B Lisbon Downtown Suites
address: 126 Rua Dos Douradores, 2100-207 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in the centre of Lisbon, B in B Lisbon Downtown Suites has well-equipped accommodation featuring free WiFi, 600 metres from Commerce Square and 400 metres from Rossio. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with bathrobes and shower. A minibar and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include St. George's Castle, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 8 km from B in B Lisbon Downtown Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Holiday Inn Express Lisbon - Alfragide
address: Rua da Quinta do Paizinho, no. 11, 2790-138 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Unlock the wonders of Lisbon from Holiday Inn Express® Lisbon - Alfragide hotel. Located just 15 minutes from the city centre and a short drive from Lisbon Congress Centre, this convenient hotel offers 3 elegant event spaces and wood-accented guest rooms with all the amenities you need. Plus, you'll enjoy a complimentary breakfast and 24-hour bar. Visit the Alegro Shopping Centre and the historic district of Belém, or take a trip to Estádio da Luz for a match or to see the NOS Alive festival. With so much to explore, come and experience the perfect Lisbon getaway.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Altis Prime Hotel
address: Rua Rodrigo da Fonseca, 4, 1250-191 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: This modern 4-star Lisbon aparthotel is less than 10 minutes' walk from Marquês de Pombal and Avenida da Liberdade. It offers self-catering suites and features a rooftop terrace with a large hot tub and panoramic city views. Suites at the Altis Prime Hotel have parquet floors and luxury bedding. They include stylish furnishings and come equipped with cable LCD TV and a kitchenette with a toaster and Nespresso coffee machine. Altis Prime's Lounge Caffé is open every day and is the ideal spot for breakfast or a drink at any time. The Altis Prime offers a 24-hour front desk service. The Altis Prime Hotel is located just 400 metres from Marques de Pombal Station. Nearby, Avenida da Liberdade is famed for its high-end shops and boutiques. Rossio Square is just 3 metro stops away and is one of the city's most historic areas. It is 3 km from the Castle of São Jorge and 1.3 km from the lively bars of Bairro Alto. Lisbon International Airport is 7.8 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Lis - Baixa
address: Rua dos Douradores, 146, 1100-107 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The 3-star Lis Hotel – Baixa is located in the heart of Lisbon city centre, a few steps from Praça do Comércio and Santa Justa lift. It offers comfortable rooms filled with charm, a 24-hour reception and free WiFi access. Each room has a modern style and a Portuguese literature, fashion or architecture theme. They are equipped with a minibar, and a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a private bathroom with a bathrobe, slippers, magnifying mirror, scale and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy a rich daily buffet breakfast in Taberna do Lis, as well as a nice lunch or dinner with the company of a Portuguese wine. In the afternoon, guests can enjoy the summer terrace with some delicacies of traditional Portuguese cuisine. Room service is available from 07:00 to 23:00. The reception staff can arrange rental cars and bicycles, as well as a comprehensive roadmap to the beautiful city of Lisbon. The hotel also provides laundry and dry cleaning services. Also available is an airport shuttle, upon request and at an additional cost, as well as parking service. Rua Augusta, filled with shops and restaurants, is within walking distance from Hotel Lis, as well as the busy Armazéns do Chiado. Lisbon International Airport is 7 km away, and both Rossio Train and Metro Station can be reached in less than 5 minutes’ walking.

name: Hotel Alif Avenidas
address: Avenida Duque D'Avila, 189, 1050-082 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The Alif Avenidas is located in Lisbon, opposite the São Sebastião Subway Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms with LCD TV, and provides 24-hour front desk service. Alif’s spacious rooms have parquet floors and trendy furnishings. They come equipped with a laptop safe box, and minibar. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer. Hotel Alif Avenidas also offers a concierge service, and provides luggage storage and a laundry service. Alif Avenidas is less than a 12-minute ride from the centre of Lisbon. Museu Calouste Gulbenkian is an 8-minute walk away.

name: Hygge Lisbon Suites - Estrela
address: Rua de São Bernardo, 15, 2 Floor, 1200-823 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a stovetop and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and a coffee/tea maker. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, kitchenware and utensils, and a picnic area.Expedia

name: Hotel Sete Colinas
address: Avenida Almirante Reis 67, 1150-011 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The charming Hotel Sete Colinas hotel is located in a historic building, just a few steps from the Anjo Metro Station. All rooms have air conditioning and there is free Wi-Fi. Hotel Hotel Sete Colinas offers colourful rooms with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. When weather is nice, breakfast is served on the small, outdoor terrace. Hotel Sete Colinas is situated a 10-minute drive from Lisbon Airport. There is a 24-hour reception and an elevator.

name: Hotel Miraparque
address: Avenida Sidonio Pais 12, 1050-214 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Set in a historical building overlooking Eduardo VII Park, Hotel Miraparque offers classical-style accommodation with soundproofed windows and air conditioning. Marquês de Pombal Square and El Corte Inglés shopping mall are within 650 metres away. All non-smoking rooms at Miraparque are decorated in warm colours. Featuring free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and a safety deposit box. Each has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served daily, with a variety of bread, cereals, fresh fruit and homemade sweets. The bar offers a wide range of refreshments, local wines and beer. Paid parking services are available within 500 metres from the hotel. Miraparque Hotel is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Parque Metro Station which connects to the city’s various attractions. Calouste Gulbenkian Museum is 500 metres away.

name: Avenida Palace
address: Rua 1 De Dezembro 123, 1200 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: This 19th-century building overlooks Restauradores Square and offers views of St. George's Castle in central Lisbon. It features classic rooms and free valet parking. Avenida Palace enjoys a popular location at the end of Avenida da Liberdade. The metro station and Eduardo VII Park are a short walk away. Rooms at Avenida have antique-style furnishings and marble bathrooms. They are fully air-conditioned and have satellite TV. Wi-Fi access is available. A large buffet breakfast is served daily in Avenida's grand Palace Lounge. There is also a library with books in many languages. Daily newspapers are available upon request. Avenida Palace's 5th-floor gym offers modern fitness facilities. Guests can also choose from a variety of massage services.

name: Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel
address: Rua De Santa Marta 48, 1150-297 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located 80 metres from Avenida da Liberdade, the 4-star Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel is 300 meters from Marquês de Pombal Square. This certified eco-hotel has a prime location in Lisbon and features Spa & Wellness area, as well as a gluten-free menu in its Mediterranean-style restaurant. The luxurious rooms of the Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel are decorated according to the principles of Feng Shui. Flat-screen TVs, free WiFi and Nespresso machines are standard in all of the stylish guest rooms. A temple-like atmosphere can be enjoyed at the spa, which includes wet and dry saunas, a soothing hot tub and 6 treatment rooms. For an intense workout, the Hotel also features a gym. Organic, locally sourced ingredients are blended in the Mediterranean dishes of its stylish restaurant. Vegan, vegetarian and lactose-free dishes are included in its extensive menu. The Mediterranean Brasserie offers a range of activities, including show-cooking, workshops and wine tasting. A cosy fireplace, retro décor and a comprehensive cocktail menu are available at the Urban Bar. The Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Eduardo VII Park and a 15-minutes' walk from historic Rossio. Chiado is 2 km away and features a multitude of traditional shops and typical cafés. The lively bars and eateries of Bairro Alto are within a 20-minute walk. The Hotel is 9.3 km from Lisbon International Airport, which is accessible via metro.

name: Lisboa Carmo Hotel
address: Rua da Oliveira ao Carmo 1-3, 1200-307 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in the heart of the city, Lisboa Carmo Hotel features luxury rooms with classic and contemporary décor. The upper floors of the hotel offer views of the Tagus River and Lisbon's old town. The popular Bairro Alto district is a 3 minutes' walk away. The stylish rooms have pastel coloured walls. Each is equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Some rooms have Saint Jorge Castle, city and Tagus River views. An in-room breakfast is available. A buffet breakfast is served daily. Guest can enjoy contemporary-style dining at the Maria do Carmo Restaurant. The bar serves a variety of beverages and wines. Lisboa Carmo Hotel is a 5 minutes’ walk from several restaurants, bars, cafés and shops. Historical sites and museums such as Lisbon Cathedral, Igreja de São Roque and the Chiado Museum are within a 10-minute walk away. Rossio Train Station is a 5-minute walk away and Lisbon Portela International Airport is within a 20-minute drive or train ride away.

name: Turim Alameda Hotel
address: Avenida Rovisco Pais 34, 1000-268 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located opposite Lisbon’s Instituto Superior Técnico, the Turim Alameda features free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. The guest rooms have LCD satellite TVs. Hotel Turim Alameda is situated a 5-minute walk from the Alameda and Arroio Metro Stations, making it possible to enter Bairro Alto in 5 metro stops. The Belém Tower is a 15-minute drive away. Guest rooms include air conditioning, safes and tea/coffee facilities. The rooms have double glazed-windows for a good night’s sleep. Guests can enjoy a daily breakfast in the Turim Restaurant and return for Portuguese cuisine for lunch and dinner. The Vintage Club Bar will provide cocktails. The Turim also has a library to work or read, and a private garage.

name: The Lumiares Hotel & Spa
address: Rua Do Diario De Noticas, 142, 1200-146 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Stylish boutique hotel & spa in the heart of Bairro Alto. Beautifully designed rooms make the perfect home away from home; Lumi Rooftop, the restaurant & bar, is open all day with one of the best views across Lisbon. Opposite the Gloria Funicular tram and the Miradouro de So Pedro de Alcntara (one of the most famous viewpoints) is the Rebel Caf. Make use of our perfectly formed spa, which offers a full wellness and beauty menu & a 24 hour gym.iHotelier/iStay

name: Lisboa Central Hostel
address: Rua Rodrigues Sampaio n¦160, 1150-282 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located just off lofty Avenida da Liberdade, this hostel offers shared and private accommodation and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. It hosts daily cultural events. Bright colours and parquet floors provide an airy feel to the rooms. Shared rooms offer bunk beds, while private rooms come with 2 single beds and a wardrobe for storing clothes. Each morning a continental breakfast is served in the hostel’s dining area. Guests can sample free tasty milkshakes on Milkshake Monday and drinks are available from the bar as well as from vending machines. Lisboa Central Hostel features a lounge area with flat-screen TV, perfect for relaxing after a day of city exploration. It also offers a laundry service, luggage storage room and a 24-hour reception desk. Marques de Pombal Metro Station is just a 3-minute walk from Lisboa Hostel, linking directly to the inner city.

name: Belém Tejo - Setubalense
address: Rua De Belem, 28, Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: No description found

name: 1869 Príncipe Real House
address: Travessa do Abarracamento de Peniche, 14, 1200-002 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in Lisbon, 1.1 km from the centre and 1.1 km from Rossio, 1869 Príncipe Real House provides accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony with city or quiet street views. The bed and breakfast offers a vegetarian or vegan breakfast. 1869 Príncipe Real House provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.2 km from the accommodation, while Commerce Square is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 9 km from 1869 Príncipe Real House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: My Suite Lisbon
address: Rua de Sao Boaventura, 23, 1200-407 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: My Suite Lisbon features accommodation in suites and studios in Lisbon’s historical centre. The units are just 700 metres from historical Chiado and are in the lively Bairro Alto area. All come with a living area with sofas, flat-screen cable TV and an iPod docking station. Each includes a kitchenette, air conditioning and a private bathroom with free toiletries. One of the suites enjoys views over the garden. The kitchenette allows guests the freedom to cook their own meals in comfort. Bairro Alto has a wide range of restaurants eateries and bars, many within a 5-minute walk. Chiado is Lisbon’s historical downtown and has several typical cafés and shops. Alfama is 3.8 km away and features many Fado houses. Portela International Airport is 9.2 km from the My Suite Lisbon.

name: Pestana Rua Augusta - Lisboa
address: Rua do Comercio 93-63, 1100-149 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Conveniently set in Lisbon, Pestana Rua Augusta Lisboa provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 200 metres from Commerce Square. Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. At the hotel each room has bed linen and towels. Guests at Pestana Rua Augusta Lisboa can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Rossio, St. George's Castle and Dona Maria II National Theatre. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from Pestana Rua Augusta Lisboa.

name: Turim Iberia Hotel
address: Avenida 5 de Outubro, 160, 1050-062 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The Turim Iberia Hotel offers free Wi-Fi and modern rooms just a 10-minute walk from the Calouste Gulbenkian Museum and the El Corte Ingles Mall. Rooms of the Turim Iberia include air conditioning, satellite TV and minibars. Guests can benefit from in-room coffee-and-tea-making facilities. Breakfast is served daily in the spacious breakfast restaurant. The Turim Vintage Bar provides a variety of drinks, snacks and light meals. The Turim Iberia Hotel is situated a 5-minute walk from the Campo Pequeno Metro Station, which offers direct access to Avenida da Liberdade in 3 stops. Lisbon Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Lux Lisboa Park
address: Rua Padre Antonio Vieira, 32, 1070-197 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located a 10-minute walk from the iconic Marques de Pombal Square and its metro station, the 4-star Lux Lisboa Park features a modern façade and a 24-hour reception. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. The soundproofed elegant rooms are tastefully decorated and feature soft tones and wooden floors. Each comes with air conditioning, a seating area and a flat-screen cable TV. Private bathrooms are open space and feature a shower and free toiletries. Linen and towels are provided. Lux Lisboa Park provides a concierge service and includes meeting facilities, a shared lounge, an on-site bar and a terrace with an outdoor heated pool and a hot tub, where guests may relax after a busy day. A great variety of restaurants are available within walking distance and the trendy Liberdade Avenue with its renowned shops and eateries are 1 km away. The lively Bairro Alto district, the Pombaline downtown and the historical Alfama neighbourhood are within 2,5 km. Across the Eduardo VII Park, 900 metres away, guests will find the El Corte Inglés shopping centre and the Calouste Gulbenkian gardens and museum. Campolide train station is 1.4 km away and Lisbon International Airport is 6 km from Lux Lisboa Park.

name: Browns Downtown Hotel
address: Rua Dos Sapateiros, 69-79, 1100-579 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: These trendy rooms in the centre of Lisbon include hi-tech work stations with iMac computers. All are individually decorated, including coffee station and flat-screen TVs. Wi-Fi is free of charge. With a tasteful mixture of textures and colours, all stylish rooms at Browns' Downtown are fitted with wooden floors and contemporary furniture. Breakfast is served every morning at the Brown's | Brasserie on Brown's | Central Hotel (100 meters away) between 7:30 AM to 11:00 AM. Air conditioning and private marble bathrooms are standard in all rooms. Facilities available in the coffee station include a coffee maker and an electric kettle. The hotel is sited in Lisbon's historical downtown area. The restaurants of Bairro Alto and the shopping of Baixa Chiado can be reached with 15 minutes on foot. Rossio Square is 5 minutes' walking distance, as well as the tram stop for the famous tram number 28. São Jorge Castle is a 15-minute walk from Browns Downtown Hotel and Comercio Square is 7 minutes' walking distance. Lisbon International Airport is 5 km from Browns Downtown Hotel.

name: Santosweethome 1
address: Rua Dos Mastros, 10, 1200-264 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: No description found

name: Czar Lisbon Hotel
address: Av. Almirante Reis, 103, 1150-020 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in the centre of Lisbon, 5-minutes' drive from Avenida da Liberdade, the 4-star Czar Lisbon is an ideal choice for short breaks and offers modern rooms with free WiFi. Lisbon Portela Airport is only 4 km away. The hotel features elegantly decorated rooms with wooden furniture and carpeted floors. Each of the stylish air-conditioned rooms has a flat-screen cable TV, a work desk and a minibar. Guests of the Czar Lisbon Hotel can start their day with a breakfast buffet, before exploring the city. The à la carte restaurant serves typical Portuguese cuisine, while the bar offers cocktails and light meals. You can visit one of the nearby attractions including the Tower of Belem, the Castle of St George and the Jeronimos Monastery.

name: Nicola Rossio Hotel
address: Rua 1º Dezembro, 12, 1100-486 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Lisbon, Nicola Rossio Hotel provides 3-star accommodation close to Commerce Square and Rossio. The property is set 7.1 km from Jeronimos Monastery, 8 km from Luz Football Stadium and 8.6 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Nicola Rossio Hotel all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Nicola Rossio Hotel include St. George's Castle, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

name: ibis Lisboa Centro Saldanha
address: Avenue Casal Ribeiro 23, 1000-090 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Ideal for business, leisure or shopping, ibis Lisboa Centro Saldanha is right in the city center, close to tourist sites, the airport, accessible by metro, with the historic center just 11 yards away. To relax, enjoy the comfort of our new renovated rooms, with modern equipment, free WIFI, private bathroom and 43" LCD TV.accorhotels.com

name: Castello Prime Suites
address: Marquês de Ponte do Lima 10, 1100-336 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Castello Prime Suites features an indoor swimming pool and a sauna, as well as air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi in Lisbon, 1.1 km from St. George's Castle. Each unit has a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, a seating area with a sofa, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The spa and wellness centre at Castello Prime Suites features a hot tub and a sauna. Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.3 km from the accommodation, while Rossio is 1.9 km from the property.

name: Vip Executive Eden Aparthotel
address: Praça Dos Restauradores, 24, 1250-187 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Offering a terrace bar with panoramic views over Lisbon, the VIP Executive Eden Aparthotel is centrally located in Baixa Pombalina, in Lisbon’s Old Town. The airport bus stops outside the hotel, and takes 20 minutes. Free WiFi is provided. The large studios and apartments each have a working area and well-equipped kitchens. All rooms have a TV, air conditioning, internet access and a private bathroom. The VIP Executive Eden also features a compact seasonal rooftop swimming pool. Breakfast is served daily. The VIP Executive Eden Aparthotel was recognised as “Best Tourist Achievement” in Portugal for its unique design and was awarded as "The Best Urban Renovation Project". It is 10 minutes by public transport from the Sta. Apolónia train station. Bairro Alto is a 10-minute walk.

name: Riviera Hotel
address: Rua Bartolomeu Dias, Junqueiro, Carcavelos, Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Only 300 metres from the magnificent Carcavelos Beach and 24 km from the Lisbon centre, this 4-star hotel provides 2 pools and rooms with private balconies. The Riviera shopping centre is adjacent to the hotel. It provides accommodation in air conditioned rooms and suites, each with a private bathroom including free toiletries. All units have a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and a balcony with a view. The hotel has free WiFi access in all areas, with rooms providing access suitable for basic internet browsing. An à la carte menu is served by A Concha restaurant, while after-meal drinks can be enjoyed at the bar. Alternatively, various ocean front restaurants are available within a 5-minute drive. Explore the beautiful beaches of the Estoril Coast or take a trip into the countryside with a rented bike. Riviera Hotel is located a 15-minute walk from Carcavelos Train Station, where guests can take a train to Cascais and Lisbon. Cascais is 11 km away, while scenci Sintra and its monuments are 25.2 km from the Riviera. Lisbon International Airport is 28 km from the hotel.

name: My Story Hotel Tejo
address: Rua Dos Condes de Monsanto 2, 1100-159 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Situated only a five-minute walk from Rossio Railway Station, My Story Hotel Tejo provides guests with a convenient base when visiting Lisbon. It is close to Rossio Square, dining options and shops. There are a variety of amenities on offer to guests of the hotel, such as a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and bicycle rental. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to offer assistance. Rooms are air-conditioned and have premium amenities such as a marble bathroom, a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. They all provide a private bathroom where guests can relax in a bathtub. Those staying at My Story Hotel Tejo can unwind at the on-site bar, ideally based for socialising in the evening. My Story Hotel Tejo is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Lisbon, with Santa Justa Lift only a short walk away. Bairro Alto and Lisbon Cathedral are within walking a distance.Revato

name: Hotel Convento do Salvador
address: Rua Do Salvador, 2 B, 1100-465 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in the historical neighbourhood of Alfama in Lisbon, the Hotel Convento do Salvador is just a 6-minute walk from the iconic São Jorge Castle, the Sé Cathedral and the National Pantheon. Free WiFi is available throughout. Set in a former convent, this hotel offers a variety of rooms adapted for modern needs including families and guests with reduced mobility. Each air-conditioned room features a flat-screen cable TV, a telephone, a wardrobe, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a shower and a hairdryer. Rooms offers panoramic views over the city of the Tejo River and the some of the common and private areas of the hotel are decorated with paintings of renowned Portuguese contemporary artists. The hotel also includes facilities for meetings and events. With the famous Tram 28 passing by the door, the Hotel Convento Salvador is within walking distance from a variety of restaurants, bars, Fado Houses, museums and belvederes. The Santa Apolónia transport hub is 700 metres away and Lisbon International Airport is 6 km away.

name: Hotel Borges Chiado
address: Rua Garrett, 108-110, 1200-205 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Overlooking Lisbon’s Chiado Square, Hotel Borges offers rooms with satellite TV and some feature a private balcony. Facilities include a tour desk. The Fado clubs of Bairro Alto are just a minute’s walk away. The air-conditioned rooms of Borges are decorated with floor-to-ceiling windows, carpeted floors and wooden furniture. All rooms have an en suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy drinks and refreshments at Borges Hotel’s terrace. Room service is available as well. Halal Food options are available. Hotel Borges’s reception is open 24/7, as is the fitness centre. The hotel also offers car rental, laundry facilities, and a ticket service. The Mario Viegas Theatre and the Museum of Chiado are situated within walking distance. Lisbon Airport is a 16-minute drive away.

name: Upon Lisbon Prime Residences
address: Rua Luciana Stegagno Picchio, 12, 1549-023 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Upon Lisbon Residences features elegant apartments and studios, with views over SL Benfica's Stadium of Light. Featuring an on site restaurant and bar on the rooftop area, guests can enjoy a meal with a view to the stadium. Alto dos Moinhos Metro Station is 600 metres away and connects with the city centre. The studios and apartments all feature a modern décor, with plenty of natural light. Each is air conditioned and includes a flat-screen cable TV, as well as a sofa in the comfortable living area. The private bathrooms come with free toiletries and there is also a full kitchenette, including a coffee machine. Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the kitchenette, which comes fully equipped. Alternatively, guests can visit the on site restaurant or enjoy drink at the bar area. The nearby Colombo Shopping Centre has an extensive food court, along with various shops, boutiques and even cinemas. The building's rooftop area also boasts an outdoor swimming pool, which all guests of the Upon Lisbon are welcome to use. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Rossio, in Lisbon's historical downtown area is a 20-minute metro ride away, while Liberty Avenue's high end shops are a 17-minute metro ride from Upon Lisbon Residences. The lively bar areas of Bairro Alto and Cais do Sodré are at 10 km and 11.3 km, respectively. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 7.2 km from Upon Lisbon Residences and is reachable via metro.
